DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf01Subtitle: *General, the GLA managed to defeat the US forces in this area. We launched a devastating counter attack, but like roaches they are still alive
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf02Subtitle: *Even now the GLA survivors are rebuilding
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf03Subtitle: *To finally eliminate the GLA we must send in our forces and root them out of every dark corner in which they hide
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf04Subtitle: *General, our new Listening Outposts are stationed in the area. They are at your disposal
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf05Subtitle: *The Listening Outpost itself is unarmed, however its passengers can fire on enemies that venture too close. You will find its long sight range and stealth ability greatly enhances battlefield awareness
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat01Subtitle: *No GLA will slip past our garrison
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat02Subtitle: *Toxin Tractors! They're trying to poison us all... we need support!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat03Subtitle: *Look... Oil Derricks... should we capture them?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat04Subtitle: *GLA in your home? Apply a little fire... no more GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat05Subtitle: *The GLA are rebuilding over there... stand ready to attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat06Subtitle: *We will win this day... everyone advance...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01aSubtitle: *I did not think the United States would be defeated so easily
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01bSubtitle: *I do not understand why the United States has allowed this to happen
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01cSubtitle: *This can not be allowed to stand. China will make things right
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01dSubtitle: *The GLA's treacherous use of our resources against the Americans has caused great embarrassment to China. They must pay for their insolence
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin02Subtitle: *The missiles are prepared and ready for launch... final countdown started
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin04Subtitle: *They believe they have won the day, but they celebrate too soon
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin05Subtitle: *It is pretty when used for the right reasons...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin06Subtitle: *GLA survivors are running to town for cover... they must be stopped!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin07Subtitle: *We are in position... bomb bay doors open...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin08Subtitle: *We have spotted survivors. Ground assault will be necessary
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO01Subtitle: *General, our former base in the region was overrun by the GLA. You will need to construct a new base before you can engage the enemy
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO02Subtitle: *May I suggest that you garrison several of the nearby buildings to defend our base
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO03Subtitle: *General, the GLA has garrisoned several buildings throughout the town. Perhaps you could use a Dragon tank to clear out those garrisons
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO04Subtitle: *General, the GLA is moving Toxin Tractors towards our garrisoned buildings. If those tractors attack those buildings, everyone inside will be eliminated
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO05Subtitle: *The GLA are using these Oil Derricks to fund their forces. One of our Red Guard could capture those derricks. The proceeds would help defeat the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO06Subtitle: *General, is it wise to destroy these Oil Derricks? They would provide valuable resources for us. One of our Red Guard could capture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO07Subtitle: *You have caught them off-guard, General. One of your Red Guard could capture their buildings before they are able to respond
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO08Subtitle: *Now that you have re-established our base of operations, it is time to root out all remaining GLA forces in the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO09Subtitle: *Congratulations, General. You have freed the town of all GLA forces. Once you have wiped out their final base, your mission will be complete
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi02Lin13Subtitle: *The Terrorist threat is finished. Good work, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf01Subtitle: *General, the GLA are attempting to steal the nuclear warheads stored at this facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf01aSubtitle: *General, the GLA are attempting to destroy our main nuclear power plant
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf02Subtitle: *Our brave soldiers held off their attack but at great cost and the GLA is still out there
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf03Subtitle: *You must hold off the GLA and insure that every one of our Bunkers is protected
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf03aSubtitle: *You must hold off the GLA to insure that the facility is not destroyed
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf04Subtitle: *We have several new technologies that should be of great benefit to your mission, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf05Subtitle: *Our Nuclear Cannons are now upgraded to fire neutron shells. These new shells effectively eliminate soldiers and vehicle drivers. Once the radiation has cleared, one of our infantrymen can then capture the surviving vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf06Subtitle: *Our buildings can now upgrade to Neutron mines. While still effective against infantry, they will also temporarily incapacitate enemy vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07aSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 15 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07bSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 10 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07cSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 5 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat01Subtitle: *Enemy forces sighted. We will hold them back
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat02Subtitle: *We're taking fire on the right flank... support is needed here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat03Subtitle: *They are behind us... direct all fire to the south!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat04Subtitle: *GLA base in range... all teams ready to attack, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat05Subtitle: *Enemy buildings on that ridge. Give the word, General, and we will roll over them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat06Subtitle: *Watch those RPG Troopers! We need help!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat07Subtitle: *General, we are over the target area now and have commenced bombing
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat08Subtitle: *Rolling out the carpet... of bombs. Heheh
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat09Subtitle: *Enemy air defenses are thick here... we are taking heavy damage
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat10Subtitle: *Stinger sites have locked onto us... we are in trouble!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat11Subtitle: *Stop that Rebel, he's trying to capture our bunker!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat12Subtitle: *It isn't a Battlemaster, but it will have to do
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat16Subtitle: *Now we will show them how to attack a base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat17Subtitle: *Reinforcements! We are glad to see you!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat18Subtitle: *We are ready for your orders, General. Where do you need us?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01Subtitle: *We must be on our guard. Reports say the GLA might attack as revenge for our entering the war
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01aSubtitle: *I don't feel safe guarding this nuclear plant
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01bSubtitle: *Yah. I wish I had joined up with the air force instead
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01dSubtitle: *Surely after our recent victory they would not dare to attack us here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01cSubtitle: *Their food is much better. And they get to wear those fancy helmets
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin04aSubtitle: *Another wave! They've got bomb trucks and terrorists! We need reinforcements!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin04bSubtitle: *Another wave! They're using suicide tactics! Where are those reinforcements?!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin06Subtitle: *They're trying to get to the storage bunkers! Protect them at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin06aSubtitle: *They're trying to get to the main reactor! Protect it at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin07Subtitle: *The Command Center... they got the Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin09Subtitle: *Not much left. We're going to need reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin10Subtitle: *The message got through, but we'll have to hold until they get here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO02Subtitle: *General, GLA forces are attacking the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO02aSubtitle: *General, GLA forces are attacking the nuclear plant!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO03Subtitle: *The GLA is attempting to capture one of our bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO04Subtitle: *General, this bunker is badly damaged. May I suggest it be repaired before another GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO04aSubtitle: *General, our nuclear plant is badly damaged. May I suggest it be repaired before another GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO05Subtitle: *General, that last attack severely weakened several bunkers. If one of them is destroyed, the GLA will win this encounter
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO05aSubtitle: *General, that last attack severely weakened the nuclear plant. If it is destroyed, we will fail our mission!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO06Subtitle: *Warning... GLA forces moving towards the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO06aSubtitle: *Warning... GLA forces are moving towards the power plant!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO07Subtitle: *General, I've made contact with one of our spy outposts. They are under GLA attack. If we can rescue them, I can patch into their system and we will be able to call in carpet bombers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO08Subtitle: *General, if you can secure that spy outpost, it will allow you to direct carpet bombing runs on the GLA forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO09Subtitle: *General, now that our reinforcements have arrived it is time to eliminate the GLA from this area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf01Subtitle: *Greetings, General. Now that we have thwarted the GLA's counterattack, it is time to press our advantage!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf02Subtitle: *We must liberate this town from the GLA's clutches
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf03Subtitle: *There is a very heavily defended GLA base north of the river. We must destroy it, but it will not be an easy task
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf04Subtitle: *Our operations have attracted much attention from the rest of the world, and we will be watched closely. The longer this battle goes on, the lower our International Opinion will fall
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf05Subtitle: *Damage to civilian property must be avoided. Our operation must be precise, and swift. Destruction of GLA forces will cause International Opinion to rise, in our favor
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf09Subtitle: *If our International Opinion becomes high enough, the people of the town might join our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf10Subtitle: *It will then be easy to annihilate the GLA's defenses
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat01Subtitle: *They must have a camouflaged Tunnel Network near here...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat05Subtitle: *They are coming from the far side of the lake
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat06Subtitle: *Their troops must be hidden in the forest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat12Subtitle: *The people are too afraid to come out from their homes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat13Subtitle: *We must free them from this oppression!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO10Subtitle: *General. Destroying the GLA statues will be critical to increasing our International Opinion and will boost support of our efforts amongst the population
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO11Subtitle: *They have dispatched a Toxic Tractor to clear our garrisonned structures!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO12Subtitle: *Our Dragon Tanks will be a high priority target... guard them well
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO13Subtitle: *Well done, sir. The destruction of the statue has caused world opinion to rise
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO16Subtitle: *Do not let them destroy the buildings!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO17Subtitle: *Use the Neutron Shell to clear buildings without damaging them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO18Subtitle: *Beware! Their defensive structures are hidden with camo-netting
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO19Subtitle: *General, the GLA have the city well-defended. We need to clear them out
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO20Subtitle: *You're making good progress, General. Much of the city is now free of GLA control
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO21Subtitle: *Sir! The city is rising up against our foes!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO22Subtitle: *General, we must clear the GLA from this area!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO23Subtitle: *Our International Opinion is high. Great work!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat01Subtitle: *They have almost escaped! We must stop them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat010Subtitle: *They are skirting the lake. Intercept them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat012Subtitle: *We have stopped the first wave of GLA!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat013Subtitle: *Again we have put them in their place!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat014Subtitle: *No one can stand to the might of China!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat018Subtitle: *We will banish them from the skies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat03Subtitle: *We cannot let them get past that hill
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat04Subtitle: *They will surely pass by here. We should defend this area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat15Subtitle: *Our forces are in position. We are ready for anything
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat16Subtitle: *They are stronger than we thought. We need air support. Send in the Helix now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO01Subtitle: *The GLA is sending forth another wave!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO02Subtitle: *This wave is retreating towards the north
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO04Subtitle: *This wave is retreating to the east
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO05Subtitle: *The European Union is extremely pleased with our performance, General. We need to stay aggressive and eliminate the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO07Subtitle: *General, they have a scud storm! We must spread out our troops to deny them a target!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO09Subtitle: *The GLA have no honor! They have decimated the village to clear a path!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO10Subtitle: *We should assemble a base to secure this region
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO11Subtitle: *Our Helix is the Overlord of the skies. Build more to help us control the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO12Subtitle: *Sir, I recommend placing Listening Outposts at key locations
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO13Subtitle: *Current Intel reports that the GLA are retreating towards this location. We will make our stand here. Do not permit any GLA units to leave this area. Our new Helix Helicopter should assure your success. The appearance of our forces from the south will signal the completion of your main objective
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO14Subtitle: *Current Intel reports that the GLA are retreating towards this location. We will make our stand here. Do not permit any GLA units to leave this area. If too many of them escape, our mission will be a failure. Our new Helix Helicopter should assure your success. The appearance of our forces from the south will signal the completion of your main objective
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO15Subtitle: *A wave of GLA is approaching from the west
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO16Subtitle: *There is a wave of GLA approaching from the south
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO17Subtitle: *GLA forces have been spotted approaching from the southwest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO19Subtitle: *A wave of GLA forces are approaching from the southwest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO21Subtitle: *Excellent work, sir. Intel confirms that you have destroyed the entire wave
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO22Subtitle: *The enemy is about to breach our defenses
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO24Subtitle: *Our defenses have been breached, General, we have failed the mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO25Subtitle: *General, our forces from the south have arrived. Our mission was a success
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO26Subtitle: *General, enemy forces are dangerously close to making their escape. We must deal with them quickly!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO27Subtitle: *GLA forces have been detected fleeing through this location. Move into defensive positions and await enemy contact
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO28Subtitle: *General, Wave 1 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO29Subtitle: *General, Wave 2 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO30Subtitle: *General, Wave 3 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO31Subtitle: *General, Wave 4 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO32Subtitle: *General, Wave 5 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO33Subtitle: *Our forces have arrived from the south. You have been successful in preventing the enemy retreat. Good job General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO34Subtitle: *General, the enemy forces have escaped to the North. We have failed the mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi05OfficerC01Subtitle: *It's time we corrected our mistake. Kill them all!
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi05OfficerC02Subtitle: *Let us flush these rats from their holes. Death to the cowards!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf01Subtitle: *Thanks to your remarkable efforts in Halberstadt the GLA are all but finished. US intel has located the last GLA stronghold outside of Hamburg. Unfortunately we were too late to help the Americans in this area and the GLA captured their base. Build your forces and destroy both the GLA and US bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf02Subtitle: *The GLA have captured an old US base in the region and are building up. Your Final Objective is to Destroy both the US and GLA bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf03Subtitle: *The GLA have increased their stealth abilities, General. They can now stealth just about anything. We'll need to stay alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf04Subtitle: *Use your Listening Outposts to detect stealthed units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf05Subtitle: *General, I suggest you first concentrate your attack on the US base. We need to take out their Particle Cannons
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xChat01Subtitle: *It feels like we are on an Easter Egg hunt, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin01Subtitle: *Corporal! Any sign of the Chinese yet?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin02Subtitle: *No sir, the last message received was at 02:00... nothing since
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin03Subtitle: *Well, I hope they get here soon. Our intel points to a full-scale GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin07Subtitle: *Our base has been breached... all units to your stations! Where are those Chinese we were promised!?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin08Subtitle: *Fox in the hole! Fox in the hole!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin10Subtitle: *They're capturing our buildings! We can't hold! All units, fall back! Repeat, fall back!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO01Subtitle: *That's it! Power to the US base is down! Finish them quickly before they can rebuild!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO02Subtitle: *Well done, General. The enemy can no longer produce US units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO03Subtitle: *Well done, General. The enemy can no longer produce GLA units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO04Subtitle: *Well done, General. The US base has been neutralized. Destroy the GLA base to finish this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO05Subtitle: *Well done, General. The GLA base has been neutralized. Destroy the US base to finish this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO06Subtitle: *We must finish what the US was not able to do. The GLA must fall and the world will be at peace
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO07Subtitle: *If we are able to defeat the GLA and save Europe from its clutches then there are great rewards to be had
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO08Subtitle: *General, you will take your place among China's finest heroes. The GLA has fallen and China is the shining beacon in a new world. Take you place of honor and bask in the glory that is China
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO09Subtitle: *General, the enemy has improved their stealth ability, but they do not appear to be using tanks
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO10Subtitle: *General, the GLA commander is lacking tanks. Perhaps we can overwhelm him with our forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO11Subtitle: *General, we are losing vehicles to Jarmen Kell. You must track him down if we are to stand a chance
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO12Subtitle: *General, the enemy is using HIJACKERS! We need to stop them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO13Subtitle: *General, the enemy has positioned SNIPERs in the local villages. We must clear them out
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO14Subtitle: *General, we are losing troops to the enemy's Quad Cannons, we need heavy armor out here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO15Subtitle: *General, current intel suggests Jarmen Kell may be holed up in this small village
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO16Subtitle: *General, the enemy's base seems to be on the other side of this river. Perhaps we can lock him in by positioning forces near the bridges
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO17Subtitle: *General, we have many driverless vehicles in the field... send units to recapture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO18Subtitle: *Sir! We have detected Battle buses in sector C. We should deal with them before they can reach our base
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO19Subtitle: *General, the enemy has slipped units into our base! We should improve our defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO20Subtitle: *General, the enemy has infiltrated our base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO21Subtitle: *General! Taking out the American Command Center will put a stop to his heavy Air support
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO22Subtitle: *General, we need to get our INTERNET CENTER built as quickly as possible. It will help us locate enemy positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO23Subtitle: *General, the enemy has left his Flank unguarded! Now is our chance to counter attack!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO24Subtitle: *General, the Americans have superior stealth detection technology. Perhaps you should capture this base instead of destroying it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01Scorpion108Subtitle: *We have found a secret way. It's poorly guarded
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat02Subtitle: *Enemy position spotted! We must find a way past them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat04Subtitle: *American Sentry Drones! We must destroy them quickly before they sound the alarm!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat05Subtitle: *Look at them scramble! Our attack was a complete surprise!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat06Subtitle: *American attackers closing in! We must hold our position, General!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat07Subtitle: *Our surprise was complete! All units, concentrate on their power plants!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin01Subtitle: *Patrol to base: Target has been located and we are in pursuit
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin02Subtitle: *Be advised, the bombing campaign has already begun. Be careful, Patrol
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin03Subtitle: *Roger that, base. I'm on the right
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin08Subtitle: *Base! Charlie three is down! Repeat: Charlie three is down!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin09Subtitle: *Continue pursuit, Charlie two! This is our best shot at him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin12Subtitle: *Heh heh. General, we've made our escape.and are headed for the rendevouz point. The GLA shall rise again
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin14Subtitle: *This is scout team. We detect no enemy presence. Wait...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin16Subtitle: *Sentry Drones! These Americans are most clever. Their drones are hidden when they are still. You must proceed with caution, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen01Subtitle: *The Americans have surrounded our stronghold with military checkpoints. You must clear the way
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen02Subtitle: *General, you must help our true leader escape, so that the GLA can live on
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen03Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax may have died for the cause but he was inconsequential. If our brother escapes the US will not have seen the last of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen04Subtitle: *General. The Fire Base defenses around this American position are too strong. We should avoid a direct confrontation and find another way into the base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen05Subtitle: *Hold you forces back, General. We are sending in a team to scout the other side of the bridge. They will report back on enemy positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen06Subtitle: *My General. One of our Quick Strike teams has managed to elude their American pursuers, and have agreed to aid us in our mission. Their rocket pods should prove most useful against enemy armor
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen07Subtitle: *We have discovered one of our demolitions teams. They will help us to clear a path by destroying the outlying US support bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen08Subtitle: *General. We must secure the airfield before the transport plane arrives. The survival of the GLA depends on your success
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen09Subtitle: *Our Combat Cycles are very versatile. They enhance the abilities of our loyal infantry, and are able to travel over rough terrain. They are even able to survive a jump off cliffs. Use them to bypass American strong-points and attack their vulnerable sides
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen10Subtitle: *General! The Americans have sent a second group of pursuers to capture our leader. Protect him at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen11Subtitle: *General, this hidden base can provide us with the resources we need to push past the American siege and reach the airfield
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen12Subtitle: *General, our leader is under attack! He must not fall to the Americans!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen13Subtitle: *General, your forces are moving too far ahead of our leader. Remember that he must reach the airfield if our cause is to survive
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen14Subtitle: *Another American base. It must be eliminated. Be wary of their Fire Bases, sir
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen15Subtitle: *We are within reach of the airfield, General. Destroy the American forces and secure the area that we may fly our leader to safety
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen16Subtitle: *Well done, General. With you in command, we can not fail
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen17Subtitle: *We have reached the airfield, sir. Make sure our leader is ready and waiting at the air strip when his plane arrives
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen18Subtitle: *Our plane is on approach, General! Just hold your position for a little longer. Our leader must survive to board that plane!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen19Subtitle: *The plane has arrived. Load our leader in so that we may fly him to safety and regroup
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen20Subtitle: *The plane is waiting for our leader to board. Make haste and bring him in, General. Our forces cannot hold out indefinitely against the Americans
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen21Subtitle: *Our operative, Jarmen Kell, has been harassing the American supply lines. He will be of great help to our mission, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen22Subtitle: *Excellent work, General. We will show the Americans that we still have the power to resist them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen23Subtitle: *We have discovered an advance scout force, General. They have offered to aid us with our mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen24Subtitle: *General! Take out the American power plants to shut down their base defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen25Subtitle: *Our forces have been weakened, General. We must choose our battles more wisely
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02Chatter04Subtitle: *We are here and ready for your command
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat02Subtitle: *The resistance is too strong, there must be another way
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat03Subtitle: *The Prince must be stopped. The GLA must not fall to him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat07Subtitle: *We must rebuild our Arms Dealer quickly
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin01Subtitle: *This is Recon 1 to base. I am finishing my patrol. Sector is clear
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin02Subtitle: *This is base. Are you certain, Recon 1? We've had reports of troop movements linked to Prince Kassad
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin03Subtitle: *I am most certain. I haven't seen anything but dust and shrubs for hours now. Returning to base after this
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin05Subtitle: *Recon 1 to base! Enemy contact! Repeat, enemy contact!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin08Subtitle: *Recon 1, what is your status? Recon 1! Report!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin09Subtitle: *Once Prince Kassad is removed the GLA will be under our control. Then vengeance will be ours and the American infidels will burn
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin10Subtitle: *Prince Kassad is beginning to take control wherever he can. We must put an end to his vie for power
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen01Subtitle: *General, our resources are running low -- we must find a new source of supplies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen02Subtitle: *Kassad is attempting to capture nearby resources! We must not let him take what is rightfully ours!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen03Subtitle: *We must reunite the GLA under one leader!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen04Subtitle: *Beware! Kassad has launched a sneak attack against us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen05Subtitle: *We have much bigger plans than that rat Kassad. The world will quake as we unleash the fury of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen06Subtitle: *We have acquired GPS Scramble technology! Now we can use Kassad's tricks against him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen07Subtitle: *Excellent, General! We have secured the Sneak Attack ability!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen09Subtitle: *If we can capture the enemy Command Center we can use their technology against them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen10Subtitle: *General, we must capture their Command Center and use their knowledge to progress towards our goal of uniting the GLA under one flag
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen11Subtitle: *We are running low on resources. We must capture some oil derricks
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen12Subtitle: *Our enemy is attacking our Oil Supply! They must be stopped!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen13Subtitle: *Use the GPS scramble to sneak past the enemy defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen14Subtitle: *The GPS Scramble will not work here, there are too many Stinger Sites.We will need to use a different tactic
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen15Subtitle: *Perhaps we can find an unguarded area to use our new Sneak Attack ability
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen16Subtitle: *Do not destroy the Command Center. We need to capture the structure and keep it intact
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen17Subtitle: *Their knowledge must be stolen. We need to use their advanced tactics to defeat them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen18Subtitle: *General, be wary of snipers -- Kassad loves to use them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen19Subtitle: *This bridge is heavily defended. We will need assistance in getting across it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen20Subtitle: *Capture the enemy Command Center to the North!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen21Subtitle: *Capture the enemy Command Center to the West!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen22Subtitle: *General, if we capture this cannon, we can use it against Kassad's forces!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen23Subtitle: *If we capture the Command Center, we can use their abilities to turn the tide of this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen24Subtitle: *Prince Kassad is no more. The GLA are once again united against our enemies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen25Subtitle: *Now that we have GPS scramble, we can move unseen past Kassad's bridge defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen26Subtitle: *The traitor has fortified himself on this hilltop and cut all other means of access. Sneak Attack is the only way we have to strike at his main base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen27Subtitle: *General, this area is being controlled by Prince Kassad. He has turned his back on his brethren and will not aid us in our cause against the infidels
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen28Subtitle: *Kassad is a master of stealth, hiding his forces in plain sight. He refuses to share his knowledge with us, so we will take it from him
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen29Subtitle: *A GLA splinter cell commanded by Prince Kassad is controlling this area. Kassad refuses to let us use his abilities for the good of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen30Subtitle: *Kassad is a master of stealth, relying on several techniques to surprise and attack his enemies
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen31Subtitle: *GPS scramble gives him the power to have any unit strike unseen against an enemy
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen32Subtitle: *Tunnel sneak attacks offer further tactical advantages...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen33Subtitle: *We must have these technologies. If Kassad will not share, we will take them from him. Capture his command centers and turn his own abilities against him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03Kenwar15Subtitle: *We have spotted a Prison Camp, our brothers are held inside
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf02Subtitle: *Kassad was too cowardly to make an attempt against the US such as this. General, you are truly a master mind
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf03Subtitle: *Once the US Mediterranean naval force is shattered all of Europe will be in our grasp
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf04Subtitle: *Now that we are again united, it is time to make our strength felt!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf05Subtitle: *The USA has attacked our secret base in the Mediterranean
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf06Subtitle: *But before it was wiped out, we learned of the location of their Particle Cannon and naval fleet in the region
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf07Subtitle: *Most of their ships are in port and helpless. We will steal their Particle Cannon and use it to take out their Aircraft Carrier!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf08Subtitle: *Look for an opportunity to reclaim and rebuild our secret base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xChat06Subtitle: *We have them where we want them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xCin02Subtitle: *Their carrier will be turned into scrap!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xCin03Subtitle: *We have proven the might of the GLA!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen01Subtitle: *Our Hijackers could take that tank easily...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen02Subtitle: *That Ranger is running for help! We must not let him get away
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen03Subtitle: *We'll need this Particle Cannon to sink the enemy Carrier. Defend it well!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen04Subtitle: *Our rebels can use their Capture Building ability to take control of the Particle Cannon
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen05Subtitle: *We can use our Sneak Attack to create Tunnel Networks on nearby islands
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen06Subtitle: *We must not let the pilot reach his Tomahawk!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen10Subtitle: *This Arms Dealer will serve us well
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen12Subtitle: *General, do you see those enemy supply planes? If we could destroy their drop zones, we would cripple their production!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen13Subtitle: *Ah, this toxic tractor will come in handy
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen14Subtitle: *These Quad Cannons will defend us from enemy aircraft
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen16Subtitle: *Destroy these tanks and we can liberate the Barracks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen17Subtitle: *If we clear this area, we can safely occupy the Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen18Subtitle: *Kill those troops and the Arms Dealer will be ours!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen19Subtitle: *They may be launching an attack against us! Defend our buildings!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen22Subtitle: *They are trying to retake the Particle Cannon!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen23Subtitle: *Their aircraft have destroyed our Tunnel Network!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen24Subtitle: *Those clever villains! They are targeting our Power Plants. We need power to use the Particle Cannon
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen25Subtitle: *Almost all of the power plants have been destroyed. We must have power to use the Particle Cannon!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen26Subtitle: *If we could capture some power plants, we could use the Particle Cannon against them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen27Subtitle: *Ahh.. We have found some hidden goodies
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen28Subtitle: *This pass is well defended. We should use the Particle Cannon to blast through
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen29Subtitle: *Be careful! This pass is heavily guarded!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen32Subtitle: *They have launched an A10 Strike against us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen34Subtitle: *We have disabled their Supply Drop Zones! Their production will be crippled!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen35Subtitle: *Your mission is to destroy the enemy Aircraft Carrier with the Particle Cannon. You will have to penetrate their base on the mainland to get a visual lock on the Carrier so that you can destroy it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen36Subtitle: *Great work! Now we must secure some Power Plants
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen37Subtitle: *The Tunnel Network will bring us to the next island
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen38Subtitle: *The Particle Cannon is now online. We should defend it and the Power Plants
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen39Subtitle: *All of our units and buildings have been destroyed!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen40Subtitle: *Without the Particle Cannon, it will be impossible to sink the Carrier
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen41Subtitle: *Now the Americans shall taste bitter defeat!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen42Subtitle: *They destroyed our Tunnel Network! Use the sneak attack to reclaim the Particle Cannon!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen43Subtitle: *We are closing in on the Aircraft Carrier. It is just south of here
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen44Subtitle: *There's the Aircraft Carrier! Destroy it using the Particle Cannon!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen45Subtitle: *Jarmen Kell is here to serve us
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen46Subtitle: *His snipe ability can disable enemy vehicles, allowing our infantry to then capture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen48Subtitle: *The Battleship is bombarding us! Destroy it!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen49Subtitle: *This must be the enemy's main base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen50Subtitle: *These fake buildings will fool our foes
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen51Subtitle: *Build more fake structures to trick the enemy!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat01Subtitle: *We've got to clear out those bunkers!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat02Subtitle: *Their power is down! No Patriots to deal with!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat03Subtitle: *Break down the fences and rescue our brethren!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat05Subtitle: *An american chinook would help to transport our troops. Capture this supply depot if you can
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat06Subtitle: *Get some anti air over here, general! Their Comanches are tearing us to bits!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat07Subtitle: *General, we must find some way to take out these bridge defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat08Subtitle: *General, we are using our cell phones to call in a surprise tunnel network!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat09Subtitle: *We'll need these tractors if we want to clear any bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat10Subtitle: *This ferry is under our control now! You will take us where we want to go!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat11Subtitle: *Yes, yes. I will do what you say!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat13Subtitle: *There sure are a lot of sports utility vehicles in this strange land
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xChat14Subtitle: *We have a GLA sympathizer in this area. He and his brothers have agreed to help us
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin01Subtitle: *This is team one. We are in position
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin02Subtitle: *My brethren, be careful, as we tread on enemy soil. Our main objective is to obtain chemical samples from the nearby American toxin facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin03Subtitle: *The remains of the American naval force have moved to the Mediterranean, in response to the loss of their command fleet. This has allowed us to slip in
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin04Subtitle: *We defeated them there, and we shall be victorious here
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin05Subtitle: *Brothers rejoice! Once we have the toxins from this facility, our scientists will be able to forge a weapon of mass infection
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin06Subtitle: *The Americans have meddled for too long. With this new weapon, we shall be able to strike fear into the hearts of our oppressors!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin08Subtitle: *Team one, are toxins secured and on board?
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin12Subtitle: *You are clear to proceed. We will defend your escape!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin14Subtitle: *Hold them back until we clear the landing strip!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin17Subtitle: *We'll meet again when we reach the toxin facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin18Subtitle: *The Americans think they have driven us out
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin20Subtitle: *We are nothing against this air power!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin21Subtitle: *You have not seen the last of us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin22Subtitle: *We will get our revenge, you filthy Americans!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin23Subtitle: *Let's do our part to take down these capitalist pigs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin24Subtitle: *These Americans will pay for the lives of our brethren
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin25Subtitle: *Let's light up these GLA intruders! Fox 1!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin26Subtitle: *GLA spotted offshore! All units to defense positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin27Subtitle: *We got GLA infiltration at coordinated 77BetaGamma! All available units move to respond!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin28Subtitle: *There's more of them on the beach!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin30Subtitle: *We've got GLA inside city limits! All units converge on coordinates 34AlphaAlpha
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen01Subtitle: *Good job, General! Only 15 more toxin samples to be retrieved
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen02Subtitle: *Good job, General! Only 10 more toxin samples to be retrieved
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen03Subtitle: *Good job, General! Only 5 more toxin samples to be retrieved
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen04Subtitle: *General, we have a plan to attack America's Central Command in Europe. But we do not yet have the power to strike at them directly. We need a new toxin weapon
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen05Subtitle: *Both of our forces are in place. The two groups must work together if we are to retrieve the toxins
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen06Subtitle: *Our hijackers can capture vehicles and they are stealthed unless they are moving
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen07Subtitle: *Jarmen Kell can snipe pilots from vehicles and also take out infantry at long range
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen08Subtitle: *Our Saboteurs can perform a number of secret operations like shutting down power plants
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen09Subtitle: *Our rebels are camouflaged, and can capture buildings to aid us in our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen10Subtitle: *Good luck, General. May stealth and cunning be with you in your quest
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen13Subtitle: *General, there are mines here, but we cannot detect them! We need a Radar Van!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen14Subtitle: *General, get someone into that Valve station by the river. Draining the coolant reservoir will allow our brothers to continue further
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen17Subtitle: *General! Destroy that airfield before we are wiped out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen18Subtitle: *General. We must destroy their power! Then the Americans will be sitting ducks for sure!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen19Subtitle: *General, we must capture that toxin facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen20Subtitle: *Excellent work, General. Now we must protect these trucks as they transport the toxins to the cargo plane
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen21Subtitle: *Use the trucks to begin gathering toxins from the facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen23Subtitle: *Another cell of hijackers has arrived to support our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen24Subtitle: *Another cell of rebels has arrived to support our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen25Subtitle: *JarmenKell has been found and he has returned to help our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen26Subtitle: *Our brothers have broken through and provided us with reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen27Subtitle: *The US will not suspect an attack on their soil after our victory in Greece
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen28Subtitle: *Kassad would never have had the courage to attack the US homeland
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen29Subtitle: *Once we've stolen the secret toxin agent from the US Bio Center, we will be unstoppable
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05Kenwar02bSubtitle: *Destroy the American airbase and they will lose much of their ability to project power in this region
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05Kenwar05Subtitle: *The Americans will use their airpower to stop us
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05Rebel02Subtitle: *We are defenseless against American air attacks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05Scorpion105Subtitle: *American cowards! Fight on the ground, like men!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xChat01Subtitle: *This region is under the control of the United States Air Force General Granger. We can and will use force to remove you from this area. You are hereby under order to clear out immediately
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xCin01Subtitle: *Our forces are few, but we can use what we have to come out on top
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xCin02Subtitle: *Since we do not have a base in this region we must take one!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xCin03Subtitle: *The Chinese base... We must strike now! Their Base will soon be ours!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xJarmen01Subtitle: *If you rescue our fellow comrades from the Southern US base, our elite warriors will fight alongside you!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xJarmen02Subtitle: *Thank you for rescuing our brothers! In return we will open up an area of the US base for you to begin your assault
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xJarmen03Subtitle: *Heh heh heh heh heh... (Sinister Laugh) That will teach them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xJarmen04Subtitle: *Do not let our deaths go unpunished!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xJarmen05Subtitle: *Together we have beaten the enemy! Victory is ours!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xJarmen06Subtitle: *Thank you for your help in rescuing my soldiers. We shall repay the favor and help you to take out the U.S. Central Command Base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen01Subtitle: *Once this base is destroyed the US will scurry home like cowardly dogs. All of Europe will be ours
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen02Subtitle: *The Americans have our brethren held hostage in their base. We must rescue them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen03Subtitle: *It is in our best interest to rescue the POW's from the clutches of the Americans
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen04Subtitle: *Good work! Capture or eliminate this base to ensure the POW's safety
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen05Subtitle: *We must transport them safely back home to their base in the North. No harm must come to them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen06Subtitle: *We are running low on supplies. We must spread out and capture new resources
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen07Subtitle: *More attacks from the air! We must build more air defenses...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen08Subtitle: *Rebuild our defenses quickly, we haven't long before the next attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen09Subtitle: *The new toxin agent we “borrowed” from the US will be especially effective against their own forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen10Subtitle: *First the Mediterranean fleet, then an attack upon US soil... and now begins our European domination
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen11Subtitle: *We are being attacked from the east. End the attacks now, we must eliminate them so we can focus on the main base to the north
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen12Subtitle: *Almost there... The U.S. will pay dearly for their transgressions against our people
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen13Subtitle: *We are running low on funds. Scout the area for resources, we must not be stopped
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen14Subtitle: *With this area secure we must now build up and launch an assault on the U.S. European Central Command Base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen15Subtitle: *The Americans are relying heavily on air units. Build more Stinger sites and Quad Cannons

DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen17Subtitle: *My General, we need to build a Scud Storm
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen18Subtitle: *The American General is using a Particle Cannon against us
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen19Subtitle: *We have to try a different tactic. Use a sneak attack to get units into the base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen20Subtitle: *Capture the U.S. base and build it up. We can use their weapons against them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen21Subtitle: *You must take out the Particle Cannon!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen22Subtitle: *They are attacking from the ground now. Defend our base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen23Subtitle: *Rebuild the base quickly... We must prepare for more attacks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen24Subtitle: *Well done, General. Thanks to your superior tactics we now control all three super weapons. The Americans will never know what hit them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen25Subtitle: *Finish the Americans, General. They cannot hold for much longer
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen26Subtitle: *General, we can target their chemical bunkers and create havoc in their own base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen28Subtitle: *The Americans have built another Particle Cannon. They must not be allowed to use it against us
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen29Subtitle: *We must eliminate the enemy's Southern support base now! The longer we wait, the more their attacks grow in strength
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen30Subtitle: *Reports indicate that the POW's held captive in the U.S. Base will be moved soon. We must rescue them quickly!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen31Subtitle: *You will need to completely clear the U.S. base area to free the POW's
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen32Subtitle: *Hurry, the POW's need to be rescued now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen33Subtitle: *We need to bring Radar online by upgrading it from the China Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen34Subtitle: *It is imperative that you build a GLA Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen35Subtitle: *With the small southern base gone we can focus on the U.S. European Central Command base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen36Subtitle: *The U.S. Central Command Base is massive, we have to find a way in! Perhaps sneak attacks would work
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen37Subtitle: *We need to deliver the POW's to their village so that they will reawaken their Terror Cell
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen38Subtitle: *Our brothers are being attacked! We must help them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen39Subtitle: *Return the POW's to their village, follow the river North until you reach it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen40Subtitle: *The POW's are safe! We must help them return to their village so that they may aid us in our fight against the US!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen41Subtitle: *Take these tanks and we will use them as our own!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen42Subtitle: *Secure the supplies and we will hold the perfect area from which to launch our assaults on the Americans!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen43Subtitle: *The soldiers are safe and their families are full of joy! They will fight with us and we have been given more supplies as well
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen44Subtitle: *We have let our brothers down but they will still fight alongside us
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen45Subtitle: *Our brothers will fight on our side to avenge the death of the POW's!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xKen46Subtitle: *The Americans have moved the POW's, but our brothers will still fight alongside us against our enemy!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xPOW01Subtitle: *Free us from our captors. Protect us from all US attacks and we will assist you!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA05xPOW02Subtitle: *We are ready to travel home when you are
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA06Chatter02Subtitle: *We're coming up on a bridge. No Americans
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA06General05Subtitle: *We have been discovered by the American scouts. Be ready to fight
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA06General20Subtitle: *You must push them back so you can take control of the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA07Convoy13Subtitle: *We have found some supplies, could be useful
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA08Kenwar10Subtitle: *We will have to hit them with everything we have
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA08Kenwar39Subtitle: *Our forces are prepared to begin the assault
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01Commander09Subtitle: *Echo company, bomber in-bound, you're too close, pull back!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01Eva02Subtitle: *General, capture enemy oil derricks to secure more supplies for the war effort
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xBrf02Subtitle: *The GLA launched their missile from the Baikonur Facility early this morning. Intel reports that they are preparing a second launch
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xBrf03Subtitle: *Use of this missile will severely weaken our foothold in Europe. It is vital that we remove this threat
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xBrf04Subtitle: *Our sources indicate that the next missile is being transported to the launch facility by train. These tracks are the only way into the facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xBrf05Subtitle: *If we can intercept that train in time, we can use it as cover to infiltrate the base
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xBrf06Subtitle: *The first step in completing our mission is to secure and hold this Train Depot
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xChat05Subtitle: *Get some infantry into these vehicles! We can use them to help defeat the GLA!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xChat06Subtitle: *Somebody garrison that Radio Station! We need air support now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xChat08Subtitle: *Ok boys. Let's load 'em up, and mooove 'em out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xChat09Subtitle: *Stinger sites are down! Repeat Stingers down! All units converge on GLA structures! Let's tear this place up!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xChat12Subtitle: *Will do, HQ! Got 'em in my sights
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xChat14Subtitle: *Love that fresh smell of MOAB in the morning
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xCin01Subtitle: *All units clear the launch area. Launch is scheduled in t-minus...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xCin10Subtitle: *Filthy Americans. We will torch your presence here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva01Subtitle: *Good work, General. The depot is secured
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva02Subtitle: *Now we need to build an attack force large enough to destroy the GLA base
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva03Subtitle: *Load your best units onto the train
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva04Subtitle: *The train will depart when it is completely full
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva05Subtitle: *Good work, General the train is full
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva06Subtitle: *Get that Dragon Tank up there to clear out those buildings
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva07Subtitle: *Build more units. We don't want to fail in our surprise attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva08Subtitle: *General! Get your men out of the pit! We've got MOABS on the way that are gonna blow this place to bits
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva09Subtitle: *We need to finish destroying this base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva10Subtitle: *The MOABs will be here any minute!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva11Subtitle: *Alpha Wing! Area is clear. You may proceed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA01xEva12Subtitle: *Good work, General. It looks like the GLA threat has finally been removed. It's time to put all this behind us and get looking for those WMDs
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02Comanche101Subtitle: *Thanks for getting me out, sir! Things were getting a little dicey for me
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xBrf01Subtitle: *The docks have been cleared, General. Our first task will be to hold them while the supply trucks are brought in. Until the Dozers arrive, we will have to defend this position with our troops as they filter in
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xBrf02Subtitle: *Most of our fleet survived the GLA Baikonur Attack. Our Aircraft Carrier and Battleship escorts are at your disposal to aid with this operation
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xChat03Subtitle: *Docks are all clear. No GLA in sight
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xChat08Subtitle: *We'll give them some red glare alright
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xCin01Subtitle: *Carrier Command to fleet. Keep up the fire, boys. The GLA are bringing in reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xCin02Subtitle: *Roger that, Carrier command. Maintaining suppression fire on the docks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xCin03Subtitle: *Be careful what you hit. We just want to clear it out, not destroy it
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva01Subtitle: *Good work, sir! Our next objective is to provide safe passage for the supply trucks as they travel through the city. The trucks must reach the city's supply warehouse. We must also retain control of the docks. Good luck, sir
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva02Subtitle: *Supply Trucks are beginning to move, General. We must provide protection as they make their way to the drop off point
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva03Subtitle: *I'm sending you some new prototype sentry drones. The enemy can't detect them if they stay still. The drones are also capable of spotting stealthed units as well as GLA demo traps. They should prove to be very useful
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva04Subtitle: *Our dozer has arrived sir! Begin building up your base. The GLA are preparing a new wave of attacks against us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva05Subtitle: *Great job, sir! The people of this city have expressed their gratitude for the relief supplies. Our final objective is to drive the GLA from the area. Destroy their main base overlooking the city and the area will be secured
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva07Subtitle: *General, our Sentry Drones can help spot GLA Demo Traps
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva08Subtitle: *Sir, there are still GLA near the warehouse. We need to clear them out immediately
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva10Subtitle: *Good job, all trucks are safely to the docks, now lets get them to the city
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva12Subtitle: *You've discovered a GLA training camp, sir. Intelligence believes that members of this camp were partially responsible for the Baikonur Launch. We have been ordered to take it out
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva13Subtitle: *Secure the warehouse so the supply trucks can proceed safely
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva14Subtitle: *Once the warehouse is secure the supply trucks will proceed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva15Subtitle: *Dozers have arrived general. You are cleared to eliminate the GLA at your discretion
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva16Subtitle: *Get the food to the city before the GLA can steal or destroy it
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva17Subtitle: *General, we've done it. The city is free from the GLA tyranny. It looks like they've got some Intel that will lead us straight to those hidden WMDs
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva18Subtitle: *Full naval support is available for this operation
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva19Subtitle: *Use the battleships and aircraft carrier at your discretion
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva20Subtitle: *The battleships are in range and awaiting targets, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva21Subtitle: *The CVN Daedalus is standing by with aircraft at the ready
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva22Subtitle: *The warehouse needs to be secured, but the safety of the docks must not be compromised
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva23Subtitle: *Our forces are limited in this area. You will receive reinforcements as they become available
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva24Subtitle: *Secure the warehouse without compromising the safety of the docks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xEva26Subtitle: *The GLA Base is the next objective, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xSupply01Subtitle: *As soon as that warehouse is safe, we will roll out
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xSupply02Subtitle: *Thanks for the cover fire, General! All trucks loaded and ready to move out. Just clear out that city for us, sir!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xSupply03Subtitle: *The streets are lined with Demo Traps, sir! We'll need them swept clear!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xSupply04Subtitle: *We've reached the warehouse, General. Thanks for the escort!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA02xSupply05Subtitle: *Convoy's arrived safely, sir. Thanks for the cover
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03Comanche102Subtitle: *Quad Cannons are picking us apart, sir
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03Crusader105Subtitle: *We need more support! They're chewing us up!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03Crusader304Subtitle: *Enemy contacts confirmed! They're moving in fast!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBrf01Subtitle: *General, Col Burton and Black Lotus are in position and ready for your orders
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBrf02Subtitle: *Their primary objective is this secret laboratory. It's location was revealed by the documents captured during your last mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBrf03Subtitle: *The GLA are working on a new weapon of mass destruction. Black Lotus must download this data so we know how far along their research has come
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBrf04Subtitle: *Once she has completed her download, Col Burton must bring the mountainside down on the lab and bury it forever
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton01Subtitle: *We're at the bridge. Lotus, take care of that Scorpion, I'll deal with the other guards
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton02Subtitle: *That wasn't part of the plan, Lotus
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton03Subtitle: *You'll wait for me? All right, Lotus, let's race...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton05Subtitle: *All right, I see the POW camp... looks like they have a Tunnel Network that passes under the river
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton06Subtitle: *Nice work, Lotus... Tunnels down here... just take care of a couple guards and I'll have everyone freed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton07Subtitle: *Those vehicles would come in handy if the intel about the defenses around the mountains are correct. General, we ought to rescue them, too
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton08Subtitle: *General, I'm in position near the second POW Camp... there's a Tunnel Network and guards out front. I could slip past them into the compound if I climbed down the cliffs on the south end of the camp
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton09Subtitle: *Don't get cocky, Lotus, you haven't won this race yet
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton10Subtitle: *That's the last of them... second POW Camp is secured... someone should tell Lotus to hurry up... I don't want to be kept waiting at the Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton11Subtitle: *That's some new toy. General, if you focus it at those Tunnel Networks and Stinger Sites guarding the mountain, I'll slip right by them
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton12Subtitle: *Looks like a whole GLA base. Intel never said anything about this being here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton13Subtitle: *Doesn't look like they were expecting me... a little C4 here and there and I'll make short work of this place... just say the word, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton14Subtitle: *I should be safe moving through the village... just need to watch out for any Radar Vans monitoring the area. Wish I had a couple Flash Bangs
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton15Subtitle: *This is it! I'm moving into position above the Lab... don't keep me waiting Lotus, its cold up here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton17Subtitle: *Well, Lotus, you're fast... I'll give you that. I'll be there as soon as I can
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton18Subtitle: *Alright... I'm at the mountain... Tell me when your download finishes, Lotus, and I'll bury that lab where no one will ever find it again
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xChat02Subtitle: *There they are... remember, short controlled bursts
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xChat04Subtitle: *We're taking fire... we need some support here!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin01Subtitle: *This is Spirit, I am rolling in over the target area...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin02Subtitle: *Roger, Spirit, mission is go. You ready to do this?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin04Subtitle: *This is Spirit, bomb bay doors open... bombs are away
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin05Subtitle: *Spirit to Infiltrator, your LZ is clear... Good Luck
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin08Subtitle: *Thanks for the lift boys... see you soon...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin09Subtitle: *Your small Chinooks are efficient... but I prefer the strength of our Helixes...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva01Subtitle: *General, your first objective is the destruction of this bridge. Its destruction will cut off GLA reinforcements from the other side of the river
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva02Subtitle: *General, GLA reinforcements have been sighted crossing the bridge
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva03Subtitle: *Another GLA squad has entered the area, General. Perhaps we should take care of that bridge now?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva04Subtitle: *General, it appears that there are several GLA Radar Vans in the area, if your forces get to close, they will be detected
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva05Subtitle: *Excellent job, General. Now you only need to worry about GLA forces on this side of the river
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva06Subtitle: *The GLA have a POW camp along the route Col Burton must take to the GLA Lab. If you free the men held there, Col Burton will have an easier time getting to the Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva07Subtitle: *General, intel suggests you free the men at the POW camp before you send Col Burton too far away
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva08Subtitle: *Congratulations, General, I'm sure the families of those men will be happy to hear they've been rescued
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva09Subtitle: *General, the GLA's Lab is directly north of your current position. There are a number of GLA defenses still along your route... be careful
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva10Subtitle: *It appears that those Oil Derricks are the only source of income for the GLA base. If you can destroy them you will cripple the GLA here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva12Subtitle: *General, the men you just rescued are driving our newest vehicle, the Microwave Tank
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva13Subtitle: *This vehicle has two modes: The first generates a continuous microwave field in front of the vehicle - very lethal to all infantry. The second allows it to disrupt the functions of any targeted building
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva14Subtitle: *General, the GLA know we are here and appear to be on heightened alert. Be careful when moving Col Burton into position above their Secret Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva15Subtitle: *General, the GLA have upgraded their tank shells to contain poisons. Be careful.
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva16Subtitle: *I'm showing a GLA patrol in that village, General... as well as a number of enemy forces garrisoned throughout the village
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva17Subtitle: *Maybe Black Lotus can find out more Intel about who is behind the GLA WMD program
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva18Subtitle: *That was incredible General. Looks like the GLA won't be using that facility anymore... and it seems Black Lotus downloaded some vital info about the source of this lab. For now, let's regroup and see what she was able to find out. Great work
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus01Subtitle: *The scorpion is disabled... I will take care of matters across the river. Wait until I am across and then destroy the bridge
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus02Subtitle: *It is now. Don't worry, I'll wait for you at the lab... do hurry
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus03Subtitle: *General, I am in a position to help free your forces held prisoner. Perhaps Col. Burton would like to help?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus04Subtitle: *General, could you ask Col Burton to please hurry to the POW camp... I'm tired of waiting on him
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus05Subtitle: *I will draw the camp guards attention to this side of the river. That should let you and your pet robots handle the Tunnel and free your captured men
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus06Subtitle: *General... my forces are moving on the final GLA positions this side of the river. Please inform Col Burton that he should hurry... I would prefer not to wait too long for him to catch up
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus07Subtitle: *Please inform Col Burton that I shall be waiting for HIM at the Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus08Subtitle: *I'm here, Colonel... you win. The GLA put up a stronger fight than I had anticipated. Beginning download
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus10Subtitle: *General. I am ready and waiting at the Lab... whenever the Colonel would like to arrive and finish this mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus11Subtitle: *It is cold out here. You are coming aren't you Burton?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr02Subtitle: *A couple of our men broke off to check out the village east of here before we were captured. They may still be over there
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr03Subtitle: *Good to see you, General, we thought we were going to end up captured
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr04Subtitle: *The rest of our team was captured just after we got to the village. General, we'd like to volunteer to rescue them
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr05Subtitle: *General, a squad of vehicles was captured just after we were taken. The GLA are holding them in a camp just north of here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Eva07Subtitle: *We need to clear out these Stinger Sites before we can bring in our bombers to clear the GLA from the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Eva08Subtitle: *Construction crews have arrived sir. You'll need to get our base setup before we're overrun by the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Eva09Subtitle: *Our final objective is this GLA base here, in the hills. Take it out, and the operation is complete
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Officer03Subtitle: *Terrorists detected. All units be on the alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Ranger01Subtitle: *Calling in GLA bunker location at grid square Beta Charlie 6-8-9er-4-4
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Transport01Subtitle: *Transport teams 1 and 2 approaching the landing zone
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Transport03Subtitle: *Transport Team 1 reporting! Mission completed! I'm pulling out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf01Subtitle: *General, intelligence reports that the rogue forces behind this GLA splinter cell are commanded by Dr. Thrax
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf02Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax is a wanted criminal... responsible for notorious terror crimes against the US military. He must be brought to justice
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf03Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax was developing a brand new toxin at his secret mountain lab. Thank goodness Lotus and Burton were there to stop him
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf04Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax is receiving his funding from his oil fields. We must cut off his flow of oil
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf05Subtitle: *The Intel we retrieved from the Secret Lab proves the GLA have seized these oil fields to help fund the nefarious Dr. Thrax. They may destroy them, rather then let you recapture them. Beware General, the GLA have started using Booby Traps... use Dozers to remove BOOBY TRAPS safely
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat01Subtitle: *Sir! Toxin Tractors are eating us up! Send help!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat04Subtitle: *We're losing units to Quad Cannons, sir! Send armor!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat05Subtitle: * NO! Bravo Three was killed by a Quad Cannon, Sir!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat06Subtitle: *The enemy has started sending tanks, sir! Send Missile defenders!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat07Subtitle: *Ha! GLA tanks are no match for us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat08Subtitle: *Sir, we're losing units to enemy Tanks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat09Subtitle: *What's the enemy doing with those radar vans?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat11Subtitle: *Where are those car bombs coming from?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat12Subtitle: *Sir, we need more defenses out here! Car Bombs are tearing us up!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat14Subtitle: *Sir, we need better defenses against these Bomb Trucks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat15Subtitle: *Sir, we've engaged angry mobs! Send anti-personnel units!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat16Subtitle: *Angry mobs are destroying us! Send some snipers out here!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat17Subtitle: *Sir, we need to do something about these ANGRY MOBS!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat18Subtitle: *Sir, we're losing units to Terrorists, can we get a sniper out here?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat19Subtitle: *Sir, these Terrorists are chewing us up! Send support!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat20Subtitle: *Geez! What's with all these demo traps!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat21Subtitle: *Sir, this field is littered with Demo Traps! We need to clear them out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat22Subtitle: *What?! We've lost a structure to a CAR BOMBER!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat23Subtitle: *Car Bombers are attacking us! The appear to be coming from the local town
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat24Subtitle: *Whoa! Those bomb trucks pack a punch!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat26Subtitle: *Sir, build more defenses to protect against the BOMB TRUCKS!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat28Subtitle: *Sir, we need a Pathfinder to deal with those ANGRY MOBS!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat29Subtitle: *Sir, we need anti-personnel out here NOW! These angry mobs are chewing us up!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat30Subtitle: *Sir, we've lost a building to a car bomb
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat31Subtitle: *Terrorists are destroying our buildings! Call in snipers!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat32Subtitle: *Sir! Their Bomb Trucks are destroying our base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCIA01Subtitle: *Good to see some friendlies! Let's rock!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin01Subtitle: *Satcom, this is Charlie 5. Approaching TARGET, no hostiles sighted... wait... TARGET is in sight, Satcom... over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin02Subtitle: *Roger that 5... You are a go, over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin03Subtitle: *Roger Satcom... payload is away... leaving hotzone! Over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin04Subtitle: *Roger that 5, out. Victor 3 you are go for IMMEDIATE drop... over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin08Subtitle: *Careful not to get slimed, boys... chem weapons sighted
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin09Subtitle: *This is no MILK RUN, boys! Keep your heads!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin11Subtitle: *Goats are away. Retuning to barn. Out
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin12Subtitle: *Bravo team, your primary objective is the small airstrip to your South. Secure it for incoming reinforcements. Out
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin13Subtitle: *Roger Satcom, moving out. Listen up kids! This is a FREE FIRE ZONE! Watch for ROACHES! If it moves kill it
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva01Subtitle: *The GLA has started using BOOBY-TRAPS on structures in this area. They will explode if you try to capture or garrison them. Use Dozers to remove them
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva02Subtitle: *The GLA has seized the nearby oil fields. Protect the derricks and destroy the GLA base
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva03Subtitle: *BE CAREFUL, General; the enemy may have set up traps in the oil field
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva04Subtitle: *Good news, General. Colonel Burton knows several covert operatives in this area. Lead Burton to the ops to solicit their help
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva05Subtitle: *Good news, General. There are several covert operatives in this area. Find them to solicit their help
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva06Subtitle: *Well done General, this region is now free of GLA troublemakers
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva07Subtitle: *Well done, General. This area has been secured
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva08Subtitle: *General, Your ultimate objective is to destroy the GLA base in this area. Your main source of funding will be the oil derricks. You must secure and protect them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva09Subtitle: *Well done, General. Your mission is a success
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva10Subtitle: *General, the local town is being poisoned by GLA propaganda and are launching attacks against us. Destroy the GLA radio station to quell the uprising
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva11Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA radio-station in the city to quell the uprising
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva12Subtitle: *Well done, General. The GLA propaganda machine has been destroyed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva13Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA RADIO STATION in the city to stop the car-bomb attacks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva14Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA RADIO STATION in the city to stop the bomb-truck attacks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva15Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA RADIO STATION in the city to stop the suicide attacks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva16Subtitle: *General, there are several ARTILLERY PLATFORMS in the area. Capture them for suppression fire
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva17Subtitle: *General, There is a REPAIR PAD in the area. Capture it to help heal our vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva18Subtitle: *Sir, please build more defenses to protect against the car bombers
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva19Subtitle: *Sir, the enemy has started deploying Radar Vans, they can spot our pathfinders!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva20Subtitle: *Sir, the enemy's Radar Vans are sweeping for our pathfinders... be careful
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva21Subtitle: *Sir, we should build Patriots to counter the bomb trucks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva22Subtitle: *Sir, Enemy Terrorists are proving highly effective. I suggest you send Pathfinders
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva23Subtitle: *Sir! We're losing units to Demo Traps, please be more careful!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva24Subtitle: *General, There is an OIL REFINERY in the area. Capture it to reduce vehicle cost
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva25Subtitle: *Sir, the enemy has begun attacking the OIL FIELDS
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva30Subtitle: *General, our cash reserves are running low -- capture oil derricks for needed cash
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva33Subtitle: *All the oil derricks have been DESTROYED! Your mission is a failure
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva34Subtitle: *Your base has been destroyed! Your mission is a failure
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat01Subtitle: *Our base is being attacked sir. They built a tunnel network inside our base without us knowing
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat02Subtitle: *Those buses are loaded with hostiles sir! Watch out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat03Subtitle: *Our base is being attacked sir. They built a tunnel network inside our base without us knowing
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat04Subtitle: *We offer you our assistance to rid us of this Toxin Monger. His obsession will kill us all and that we cannot allow
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat07Subtitle: *Thank you for releasing me. Transport me to my base in the East and I can help you
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin01Subtitle: *Sat-Com A4 has confirmation on base location. Visuals are uploading now
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin02Subtitle: *Field, please verify status of Toxin Production facilities
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin03Subtitle: *Then we have a go upon presentation of final clearance code
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin04Subtitle: *Roger that, Alpha Whiskey Echo, the birds are in the air
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin06Subtitle: *Clearance code is Sierra, Hotel, Oscar, Charlie Kilo
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva01Subtitle: *Phase one of our operation has been completed General. Our Tomahawk Missile strike was successful in destroying all of GLA's Toxin production facilities. Only their main base and Toxin Missile silo's remain to be eliminated
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva02Subtitle: *General, we've tracked Dr. Thrax to this remote location. He is in possession of chemical tipped missiles, and has them prepped for launch. Destroying his toxin storage tanks has slowed him down, but we must move in and secure those missiles before they can be launched
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva03Subtitle: *General, Dr. Thrax was able to develop small quantities of his new toxin. Make sure your forces are on high alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva04Subtitle: *General, due to the civilian presence in this location you will need to use ground forces to assault the final base and capture the 4 toxin missile sites in the area. Our successful liberation of the oil sites in Amisbad has provided us with additional resources for this operation
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva05Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax must be defeated so he can't inflict further terror on the world. General, you must stop him
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva06Subtitle: *Our Intel indicates that this is the best area to build your base. Local unrest may be in your favor. Good luck
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva07Subtitle: *General, the local GLA have responded to your rescue and have given us control of their base. You may now use their forces in your attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva08Subtitle: *General, your main objective is to capture the 4 Toxin Missile Silo's targeted on US major metropolitan areas before they launch
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva09Subtitle: *General, infrared scans of the area indicate that they are preparing to launch the Toxin Missiles
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva10Subtitle: *Missile launch in 5 minutes... Your final offensive should commence now
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva14Subtitle: *Missile launch in 1 minute... We must move in now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva15Subtitle: *30 seconds until missile launch... It's almost too late General!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva18Subtitle: *Toxin Missile Impact has been detected and Hot Zone is now confirmed. The casualties are incalculable General, we have failed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva19Subtitle: *The first Missile Silo has been captured and the HazMat decontamination team is en-route. One to go General
