DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke086Subtitle: *It appears we have used all the supplies in the area. I hope you've made other arrangements, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke087Subtitle: *(enemy out of power) What?! I'm out of power? How can I be out of power? Someone get me more power! Now!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke088Subtitle: *(ambulance) That ambulance will not save your men from the radiation
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke089Subtitle: *(strat center) A Strategy Center? What strategy could you possibly devise to fight me?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke090Subtitle: *(black market) The Black Market won't sell you anything powerful enough to stop me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke091Subtitle: *(propaganda center) Your propaganda will not turn anyone against my nuclear power, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke092Subtitle: *Oh, look--I have a nuke ready for you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke094Subtitle: *Three nukes?!? That's three times the fun!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke096Subtitle: *Five nukes? Maybe you want me to send you a clean pair of shorts now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Nuke097Subtitle: *(player sells building) General, if you sell off any more buildings I'll win by default
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth002Subtitle: *Here comes my next attack... try to be ready this time, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth003Subtitle: *You can't kill what you can't see
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth006Subtitle: *hanks for the new units. They'll prove useful in destroying you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth009Subtitle: *I think it's time to acquire a new base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth010Subtitle: *It was never meant to be General. Good bye!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth011Subtitle: *Closing your eyes will not make the pain of defeat any easier
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth012Subtitle: *My stealth assassins will make short work of your forces, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth013Subtitle: *We will strike like the snake--quick and invisible
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth014Subtitle: *You will not stand against this attack, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth016Subtitle: *You'll never see me until it is too late , General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth017Subtitle: *General, perhaps you could introduce me to Black Lotus. I'm a great admirer of her... uh, work
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth018Subtitle: *When it is quiet you should fear me the most
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth019Subtitle: *I can't wait for your next attack, General. Can we expect it today?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth020Subtitle: *Don't let your senses grow dull, General--you can expect my attack any moment now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth022Subtitle: *I will attack when you least expect it, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth023Subtitle: *My men are all over the battlefield, General...hidden from view... ready to strike
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth024Subtitle: *Stealth is my ally... and your enemy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth025Subtitle: *You've lost your Tech Building, General. What shall you lose next?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth026Subtitle: *You could not stop me from destroying you Barracks, General. What do you value if not your men?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth027Subtitle: *Destroying you War Factory was child's-play. Your Command Center can't be far behind
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth028Subtitle: *Your planes have lost their Air Field, and you have lost your advantage, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth029Subtitle: *There is a hole in your defenses now, General. Who can say how many of my men are in your base now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth030Subtitle: *Your Command Center is gone, General. My victory is all but assured
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth031Subtitle: *I don't relish destroying your buildings, General, but you leave me no choice
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth032Subtitle: *You are targeting my Tech Buildings because you have no hope of reaching my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth033Subtitle: *You have destroyed my Barracks, but we will rebuild and those men will be avenged
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth034Subtitle: *My Arms Dealer will not be pleased that you destroyed his depot, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth035Subtitle: *You have destroyed that base defense, General, but that just may have allowed my men time to out-flank you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth036Subtitle: *You've destroyed many of my buildings, but with even one factory left I am a dangerous opponent, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth037Subtitle: *Nicely played, General; you've destroyed my Command Center. Now I will be forced to fight dirty
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth038Subtitle: *You're quite adept at discovering my camouflaged vehicles, General. I'll consider a new tactic
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth039Subtitle: *Your brutish tactics are costing me men, General. I'll reconsider my tactics now that I know you have none
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth040Subtitle: *Now that I've captured this Oil Derrick, my forces will grow even faster
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth041Subtitle: *Artillery Platforms are so brutish, but I can't let you have it, can I?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth042Subtitle: *This Oil Refinery is now mine, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth043Subtitle: *General, you are coming dangerously close to my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth044Subtitle: *I see forces approaching my base, General. You don't mean to invade do you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth045Subtitle: *You are testing my patience, General. Remove you forces from my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth046Subtitle: *If you do not remove your forces from my base, I'll remove them permanently
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth047Subtitle: *So you're trying to enter my base from the flank. We'll put a stop to that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth048Subtitle: *A back-door attack? I didn't realize you were so devious, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth049Subtitle: *A frontal assault? That will prove a fatal mistake, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth050Subtitle: *Those are my resources, General--go find your own
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth051Subtitle: *Why do you insist on approaching my base that way, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth052Subtitle: *That route is not as unguarded as it seems, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth053Subtitle: *The only thing you will find here is your own destruction, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth054Subtitle: *What is your fascination with this area, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth055Subtitle: *We are nearing your base, General. There may be cross-hairs on your head right now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth056Subtitle: *Your outer defenses are weak, General. Let's hope you base is better protected
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth057Subtitle: *We have entered you base, General. Ignore us at your own peril
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth058Subtitle: *Your defenses are broken, General. How will you repel us now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth059Subtitle: *You really should be defending these resources, General, or this battle will be very short
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth060Subtitle: *I've found your Tech Buildings, General. What should I do with them?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth061Subtitle: *I've found the back-door to your base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth062Subtitle: *Can you defend against my flanking attack, General? Let's find out
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth063Subtitle: *Only a careless general would allow the power to fail
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth064Subtitle: *Your power is down, General. You did not plan your infrastructure properly. Let's hope it isn't a fatal mistake
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth065Subtitle: *General, you can't fight without resources. What will you do now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth066Subtitle: *You have robbed me of my resources, General. Now I will return the favor
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth067Subtitle: *So, you have built a Scud Storm. We will have to deal with this new threat
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth068Subtitle: *Nuclear weapons have no place in this battle, General. Why do you insist on building them?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth069Subtitle: *You would strike at me from space with your cowardly Particle Cannon? I am disappointed, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth070Subtitle: *So many base defenses, General. What are you afraid of?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth071Subtitle: *You're building tanks, are you. Well, a few more sniper should take care of that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth072Subtitle: *More planes? Why so many, General? Afraid to come down and face me?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth073Subtitle: *Let me give you some advice, General. That large group of infantry is no match for my snipers
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth074Subtitle: *Your base has grown so large, General. Do you think you can defend all your buildings from capture?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth075Subtitle: *You've launched! You'll regret using that Scud Storm, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth076Subtitle: *Nuclear missiles! I thought you were bluffing, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth077Subtitle: *Yes, look at the cowardly particle beam. Enjoy this, General--my answer will be swift and brutal
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth078Subtitle: *By all means, General, garrison that building... my snipers can possibly hit them in there
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth079Subtitle: *Colonel Burton, General? Perhaps you should make him the general; you'll only lead him to an early grave
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth080Subtitle: *Ah... the beautiful Black Lotus. Perhaps after you're defeated, General, she'll agree to join me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth081Subtitle: *Jarmen Kell?! All snipers beware: Jarmen Kell has entered the field
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth082Subtitle: *Wise choice, building an Air Field, but planes alone will not be enough to defeat me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth083Subtitle: *My spies tell me you've finally built your War Factory, General. Are you ready to fight now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth084Subtitle: *Train all the men you wish from that Barracks, General; they are no match for my snipers
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth085Subtitle: *You've sold-off one of your buildings. Such tactics lead to defeat, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth086Subtitle: *How are you defeating my forces?! It's not possible!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth087Subtitle: *You may have the upper-hand now, but your desperate tactics will not endure, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth088Subtitle: *My forces will rise up against your oppression and we will defeat you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth089Subtitle: *Enjoy your advantage for now, General... you'll make a mistake soon and I'll turn the tide of this battle
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth090Subtitle: *So it ends... you've defeated me, General, but someday I'll have my revenge. Watch your back, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth091Subtitle: *Your forces are weakening, General. Accept defeat and I'll go easy on you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth092Subtitle: *Your attacks are ineffective against me, General. Soon we'll sweep in and destroy you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth093Subtitle: *I'm enjoying this little game, General, but your pathetic attacks are beginning to bore me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth094Subtitle: *I thought you would provide more of a challenge, General. I guess I overestimated you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth095Subtitle: *You have fallen to Kassad, like all have before you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth096Subtitle: *We will strike like the snake--unseen and deadly
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth099Subtitle: *This will not go well for you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth100Subtitle: *My men will not accept this defeat from their leader, General. You have signed my death warrant with your superior tactics...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth101Subtitle: *Accept your bitter defeat and remove yourself from my sight, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth102Subtitle: *And another who stood against me falls...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth103Subtitle: *And so it will be for you, General--no warning, no mercy...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Stealth104Subtitle: *You still have time to flee with your life, General. <evil laughter trailing off to silence>
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank001Subtitle: *I see you haven't run in fear, General. Soon you'll wish you had
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank002Subtitle: *My forces are at your door, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank003Subtitle: *The iron dragon marches through your puny defenses
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank004Subtitle: *I fear this will end you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank005Subtitle: *Mmm... can you feel the thunderous song of approaching armor, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank006Subtitle: *Are you protecting your flanks, General? Why don't we have a look
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank007Subtitle: *Are you impressed with the modifications to my tanks, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank009Subtitle: *Soon, the field will fill with tanks... my tanks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank011Subtitle: *Nice base, General... care to surrender it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank013Subtitle: *We're in your base, General; your defenses were inadequate
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank014Subtitle: *You dare attack my War Factory! All forces, remove this pest!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank016Subtitle: *Another battalion is on its way, General, please make them feel welcome
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank017Subtitle: *Ah, this is the part of the battle I enjoy the most... the part just before I finish off my enemy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank018Subtitle: *Tanks: move faster... before our opponent considers an actual attack
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank019Subtitle: *It's quiet out there, General. There must be a lot of tanks rolling towards your base, don't you think?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank020Subtitle: *I'm going to take this time to construct more defenses... no, wait, I'll build more tanks instead
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank021Subtitle: *This area was once fertile farm land. Soon your blood will make it fertile again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank023Subtitle: *Enjoy the rest, General--soon the attacks will begin again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank024Subtitle: *We're awaiting your assault, General, but I'm beginning to wonder if it will ever come
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank025Subtitle: *Our War Factories are working hard to make more tanks, just for you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank026Subtitle: *How much longer can you survive such loses, General? Perhaps it is time to consider surrender
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank027Subtitle: *Tanks amass in our base, preparing for the final assault. Will your defenses hold this time?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank028Subtitle: *Soon we will remove you from our lands
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank029Subtitle: *This will be your last chance to prove yourself, General. Soon my tanks will end your pitiful army
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank030Subtitle: *You cannot believe your luck will hold out much longer... can you, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank031Subtitle: *You didn't want that Tech Building, did you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank032Subtitle: *Your Barracks has fallen to my tanks, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank033Subtitle: *There goes your factory, General. How will you match my armor now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank034Subtitle: *Without your airfield you've lost your only chance against me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank035Subtitle: *Your defenses fall like toys before my armor
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank036Subtitle: *You can't lost your Command Center and all hope to win against me, General. I await your surrender
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank037Subtitle: *You've lost a lot of buildings, General... isn't it time to surrender?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank038Subtitle: *That tech building was mine, General; you will regret destroying it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank039Subtitle: *So, you've destroyed my Barracks--so be it. Now I will destroy yours
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank040Subtitle: *We will rebuild that War Factory. Soon the tanks will again flow to your base like water
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank041Subtitle: *Destroying my Airfield will not stop me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank042Subtitle: *Destroying my defenses only let's me know where you are, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank043Subtitle: *General, you are destroying an unacceptable number of my buildings. This must stop
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank044Subtitle: *You've destroyed my Command Center... I am impressed, General...few survive this long
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank045Subtitle: *You're shooting at my planes?! Do you think this is the best tactic against me, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank046Subtitle: *Enough! Do not destroy any more of my tanks, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank048Subtitle: *General, I need that Oil Derrick for my tanks. Release it to me or pay
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank049Subtitle: *That Artillery Platform is no match for my armor, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank050Subtitle: *Ah, I see you captured an Oil Refinery. Perhaps I should take it from you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank051Subtitle: *We are approaching you base, General. Prepare yourself
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank052Subtitle: *Ah, my tanks are almost in range of your base. This should be over soon
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank053Subtitle: *We've breached your defenses, General. Now your factories will begin to fall
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank054Subtitle: *Thank you for inviting us into your base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank055Subtitle: *I see your flank is exposed, General. I expected as much
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank056Subtitle: *There are no guards at your backdoor--a fatal mistake on your part, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank057Subtitle: *I see you've built a second base, General. It will soon be removed
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank058Subtitle: *Ah, I've found your Tech Building. Now, should I destroy it or capture it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank059Subtitle: *Your power is down--your forces are finished
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank060Subtitle: *I would suggest restoring your power, General... before we turn it off permanently
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank061Subtitle: *Your supply pile looks low... now nothing can stop us
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank063Subtitle: *And what you plan to do with that Scud Storm, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank064Subtitle: *And now this war has gone nuclear... excellent
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank065Subtitle: *That Particle Cannon will never live to fire on me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank066Subtitle: *So many base defenses, General... all so useless
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank067Subtitle: *So, you're trying to match my tanks in the field. I question your tactics, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank068Subtitle: *I see many planes, General--like gnats waiting to be swatted out of the sky
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank069Subtitle: *You have trained too many men, General; they will all be crushed beneath my treads
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank070Subtitle: *Your base has grown too large, General--my tanks will enjoy the target practice
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank071Subtitle: *Your Scud Storm will harm us, but now you have made me angry, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank072Subtitle: *Only a failed General would resort to nuclear missiles
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank073Subtitle: *This particle beam will not defeat us, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank074Subtitle: *Yes, garrison your buildings--you only delay the inevitable
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank075Subtitle: *No one soldier can turn the tide, not even Colonel Burton
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank076Subtitle: *Ah, Black Lotus, you grace us with your presence. Perhaps you would consider fighting for me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank077Subtitle: *All tanks beware: Jarmen Kell has entered the field
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank078Subtitle: *An Air Field is a wise choice against me, but it won't save you from defeat, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank079Subtitle: *Build your War Factories, General; they still will not produce tanks capable of stopping mine
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank080Subtitle: *I see you've built a Barracks, General. Please, try to keep your men out from under my tanks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank081Subtitle: *Yes, sell all of your buildings and flee from the field, General. This battle is lost to you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank082Subtitle: *You are losing, General. This battle is mine
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank083Subtitle: *All hope is gone now, General. Surrender or die
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank084Subtitle: *General, my forces outnumber yours... it is only a matter to time now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank085Subtitle: *Your inferior strategy has lead you to this place, General. You can't win now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank086Subtitle: *My victory was assured from the beginning
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank087Subtitle: *Your tactics have given you a momentary advantage,General, but you won't maintain it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank088Subtitle: *No! You will not win, General. We will build more tanks and defeat you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank089Subtitle: *Your cowardly tactics may have gotten you this far, but this foolishness ends now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank090Subtitle: *I think I've let you win long enough, General. Prepare for the end
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank091Subtitle: *Arrrrrgh! This cannot be! How have you defeated my tanks?!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank093Subtitle: *Your tank rush is nothing compared to mine
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank094Subtitle: *Don't challenge my tanks, General--you will lose
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank095Subtitle: *My armor will crush your pathetic forces
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank096Subtitle: *You may have defeated my tanks, General, but the Tigress will crush you like an insect
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank097Subtitle: *Tanks are the key to any victory, as you well know
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank098Subtitle: *I see you defeated my scouts, General. The next attack won't go so well for you, I think
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank099Subtitle: *Here we come, General, I hope your defenses are up
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank100Subtitle: *And these are just my Battlemasters, General... just wait until the Overlord join the battle
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Tank101Subtitle: *I'd be careful, General, sometimes the Red Guard like to take over buildings while you're busy with my tanks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin002Subtitle: *One taste, and you'll never go back -- even if you wanted to!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin003Subtitle: *Have a taste of my own medicine!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin004Subtitle: *How long can you hold your breath?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin006Subtitle: *It's not so bad. You should only feel a long and painful burning after this!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin008Subtitle: *Here we come, General, like a chemical spill
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin009Subtitle: *It's so hard to find a doctor that makes housecalls, but Dr. Thrax does
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin011Subtitle: *Like acid rain, we decend upon your base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin012Subtitle: *Go forth, my toxic warriors! Bring our message to the masses!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin013Subtitle: *Oh, you're going to like this, General. No, wait... no you won't
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin014Subtitle: *You've brought this on yourself, General. Now watch your men pay for your mistake
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin016Subtitle: *That's right -- sit back and relax! Give my toxins more time to work!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin019Subtitle: *Every moment you delay, you die a little bit more!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin020Subtitle: *You can tell they're just right when the flesh falls off the bone!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin023Subtitle: *And breathe in... out... and again... feel better?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin025Subtitle: *I'll give you a \"breather\" before our next attack
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin026Subtitle: *We have a clogged toxin nozzle, General... give me a second to fix it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin027Subtitle: *You'll come for the toxin, but you'll stay... because you're dead!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin028Subtitle: *You will regret intruding on my experiments, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin029Subtitle: *Are you going to attack me, or are you afraid of what you might find at my base, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin030Subtitle: *Nothing can live beneath my toxic cloud, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin033Subtitle: *Ohh general, looks like your troops can't hold their toxin
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin034Subtitle: *Your Air Field is destroyed, General. Now you'll have to walk through my clouds of death
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin035Subtitle: *Notice how the toxins tear everything apart?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin036Subtitle: *Argh! I had my wine collection in there!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin037Subtitle: *My toxins and your troops certainly have chemistry!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin039Subtitle: *Now where will my chemical soldiers come from?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin041Subtitle: *See, people don't belong in the air
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin043Subtitle: *Stop destroying my buildings, General, or I will make things... unpleasant for you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin044Subtitle: *You've destroyed my Command Center! Ah well, I always hated my commanders anyway... now it's just you and me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin045Subtitle: *General, if you keep destroying my vehicles, how can I bring you your medicine?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin046Subtitle: *My brave warriors! How can you do this to them? What did they ever do to-- oh wait, never mind
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin047Subtitle: *Give that Oil Derrick back! Don't you know petroleum is a key ingredient in my toxins?!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin048Subtitle: *That Artillery Platform will not stop me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin049Subtitle: *General, I need that Refinery to purify my toxins. What could you possibly need it for?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin050Subtitle: *Did I give you permission to come in?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin051Subtitle: *What are you doing in here? The recipes are mine!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin052Subtitle: *You are a fool to come into my base, General!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin053Subtitle: *You are too close to my precious toxins, General. Now you must die
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin054Subtitle: *Stay away from my scud missiles! I'll give them to you when I'm ready!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin055Subtitle: *I don't think you want those supplies, they aren't... ready yet
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin056Subtitle: *I see you're building another base. Soon it will be abandoned
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin057Subtitle: *Get out of my village, General. There's not much left of it, but it is mine!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin058Subtitle: *Be careful as you cross that bridge, General--the water below isn't safe for swimming
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin059Subtitle: *Watch out, General, that bridge might not be safe... but then, what is around here?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin060Subtitle: *Do you think you're being clever, sneaking in my backdoor?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin061Subtitle: *So, you've made it across the river. Now the battle gets interesting
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin062Subtitle: *It looks like you're out of power, General. Perhaps I should attack now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin063Subtitle: *You're out of power, General. It's time for me to come and play
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin064Subtitle: *Your resource pile has grown small,General. I don't think you have enough left to stop my next attack... excellent...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin065Subtitle: *Budget?! I don't want to hear about the budget!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin066Subtitle: *You dare to build a Scud Storm in my presence! You know, of course, that we are all immune to its toxins, right, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin067Subtitle: *A Nuke Silo? I would not have expected you to use toxic radiation... perhaps we could work together sometime
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin068Subtitle: *So, a Particle Cannon to counter my toxins, eh? Your technology is no match for my toxins, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin070Subtitle: *Metal is only a temporary barrier to my toxins!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin071Subtitle: *Ah -- coward! Your pilots still need to breathe!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin072Subtitle: *Do you enjoy seeing your men glow in the dark? Build more, then!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin073Subtitle: *Your base has grown large, General... a perfect target for my Scud Storm...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin074Subtitle: *Yes, fire your Scud Storm... visit your useless toxins upon my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin075Subtitle: *Your nuclear missile will only mutate us and make us stronger, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin076Subtitle: *You cannot hope to clear my toxins with that particle beam, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin077Subtitle: *Yes, garrison that building--I'm sure my Toxin Tractors will love that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin078Subtitle: *If you bring Colonel Burton into this I'll have to release Jarmen Kell
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin079Subtitle: *Black Lotus? You know, of course, that the black lotus is a poisonous flower... I think that's in one of my toxins... but I digress...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin080Subtitle: *I see Jarmen Kell has joined our little war. Perhaps mine would enjoy a sniper duel
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin081Subtitle: *Now what do you want with that Air Field, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin082Subtitle: *So our General builds a War Factory. How predictable of you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin083Subtitle: *Yeeesss, build a Barracks--send you men to me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin084Subtitle: *Sell off allyour buildings, General... and send your men to me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin085Subtitle: *Give up now, and I guarantee you'll breathe easy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin086Subtitle: *Your troops are short of breath, General. Give up!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin087Subtitle: *My second wind spells your doom, General!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin088Subtitle: *Let me drown your sorrows with a nice toxin!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin090Subtitle: *You are defeated, General. Perhaps this will teach you to defy Dr. Thrax
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin091Subtitle: *Would you consider a peace offering? An antidote, perhaps?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin092Subtitle: *Perhaps I've inhaled too many of my own toxins--You can't possibly be defeating me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin093Subtitle: *Get away from me! You will not defeat me, General. Do you hear me!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin094Subtitle: *What do you have against toxins? Have you seen what they put in food these days?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin095Subtitle: *Even if you defeat me, my toxins will get to you -- eventually!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin096Subtitle: *No! No. I am defeated. Now where is that cyanide capsule...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin097Subtitle: *That button was covered with poison... you're already dead
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin098Subtitle: *You dare select Dr. Thrax? You should reconsider, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin100Subtitle: *Perhaps I shouldn't have gotten my degree from a mail-order college
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin101Subtitle: *You thought my toxins were ineffective and now look what has happened to you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin102Subtitle: *Hello, General. Do not think I cannot see your spies flying over my base. Please, look all you wish, because this may be the last time you ever see my stronghold
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin103Subtitle: *As you can see, my defenses are impenetrable...and my toxic weapon systems will poison your troops long before they can reach me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin104Subtitle: *And do not worry about hurting the civilian population, General; they have long since fled this valley of toxic death. Our little war will play-out uninterrupted... and your delicate sensibilities will not be taxed
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin105Subtitle: *Ah yes, and here is where you've placed your pathetic base. Now make your stand against me--Dr. Thrax--and once your forces have breathed their last breath of my toxic air, I can return to my experiments
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin106Subtitle: *Do you trust your senses, General? By engaging me, you have doomed yourself to a long and painful death, for I am Dr. Thrax, and my weapons strike unseen!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin107Subtitle: *Breathe easy, General, for I am Dr. Thrax, and with every breath you take, you are on your way to defeat!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin109Subtitle: *Would you like the green or the blue? Both are equally satisfying!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin110Subtitle: *Prepare to tell your 3-eyed grandchildren of your defeat this day!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin111Subtitle: *My precious chemicals! Do you know how long it takes to mix those?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin112Subtitle: *More victi- ah- volunteers for my experiments!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin113Subtitle: *Now I have more vehicles to ferry my toxins! So generous of you!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin114Subtitle: *Oh, did I forget to tell you about those? Watch the mines, General!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin115Subtitle: *Now where did I put those chemical troops?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Toxin118Subtitle: *Ah yes, and here is where you've placed your pathetic base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle001Subtitle: *Oh, you're still here, General. I'm impressed by your determination. Let's dance
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle002Subtitle: *That didn't hurt too much, did it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle003Subtitle: *The battlefield is a rough place, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle006Subtitle: *Everything seems to be going my way
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle008Subtitle: *Tactical superiority is key, General. Here, let me show you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle009Subtitle: *I really don't think you're going to be able to stop this next attack... do you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle010Subtitle: *Here comes another attack... oh, and almost all of my Generals Powers are ready to go... which one do you want to see first?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle011Subtitle: *Is that my Superweapon ready to go? Oh no, my attacks just feel like that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle012Subtitle: *All units: Attack pattern alpha! Just kidding... who would call something \"alpha\"?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle013Subtitle: *Here comes some of my units, General. Would you mind helping them gain some veterancy?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle014Subtitle: *I rarely send in the troops, but you deserve special attention, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle015Subtitle: *I warn you not to underestimate me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle016Subtitle: *You may think I'm hiding, but I'm really just planning
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle017Subtitle: *Fools rush in, General. I take my time
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle018Subtitle: *You don't know what to expect from me, do you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle019Subtitle: *If you fail to plan, you plan to fail, General. Think about it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle020Subtitle: *My greatest \"super weapon\" is my brain... wouldn't you agree, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle021Subtitle: *Come on, General, take your best shot
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle022Subtitle: *We're waiting for you, General. What's keeping you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle023Subtitle: *I've been analyzing you tactics and I'm just amazed... do you even have any tactics, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle024Subtitle: *I'd attack if I were you, General. If you wait then I'll just have one more Superweapon to fire at you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle025Subtitle: *So, your over-all strategy is to bore me off the battlefield?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle026Subtitle: *Are you rethinking the wisdom of attacking me, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle027Subtitle: *I've been trying to go easy on you, General, but you're starting to annoy me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle028Subtitle: *This has been fun, General, but I think it's time to end this
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle029Subtitle: *Maybe we should do this some other time... when you're not so distracted... at least, I hope that's what's wrong. You did say you were a \"general\", right?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle031Subtitle: *I didn't like the look of that Barracks, at all
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle032Subtitle: *Your vehicles are getting on my nerves
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle033Subtitle: *Stay out of the air, General--you'll be safer on the ground
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle034Subtitle: *Was that supposed to keep me out of your base, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle035Subtitle: *Wow, you just lost your Command Center. That's not very good, is it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle036Subtitle: *Your base was much too cluttered before
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle037Subtitle: *You have no respect for other people's property!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle038Subtitle: *People, who was supposed to be guarding the Barracks!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle040Subtitle: *Is keeping my air field too much to ask
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle041Subtitle: *I put that there for a reason!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle042Subtitle: *I had just gotten all of those buildings where I wanted them
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle043Subtitle: *I don't appreciate that kind of disrespect!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle044Subtitle: *I built all of those planes for a reason!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle045Subtitle: *Destroy as many vehicles as you like. See if I care
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle049Subtitle: *Capturing the Refinery? Why, General, I didn't know you were so efficiency conscious
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle051Subtitle: *I don't think you have the right security clearance to be here
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle052Subtitle: *What gives you the right to be in my base?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle053Subtitle: *This is my base, get out now!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle054Subtitle: *Don't expect me to be a good hostess
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle056Subtitle: *What do you think you're doing here?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle058Subtitle: *Your presence is starting to bother me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle059Subtitle: *Who was supposed to be guarding that area?!?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle060Subtitle: *So you've managed to crack my defenses... that won't happen again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle061Subtitle: *Get out of my base, General. Don't think I'm above dropping the Particle Cannon right here
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle062Subtitle: *It's looking a little dark in your base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle063Subtitle: *Did someone forget to pay the electric bill?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle064Subtitle: *You didn't manage your resources very wisely, did you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle066Subtitle: *How could this have happened! I had everything planned so perfectly!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle067Subtitle: *Do you think I'm scared of your little Scud Storm?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle069Subtitle: *I appreciate your choice in weaponry, but I'm the only one allowed to have a Particle Cannon on this battlefield
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle070Subtitle: *Is that as secure as your base can be? Is it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle071Subtitle: *That's a lot of tanks, General. Have you seen what a Particle Cannon can do to a lot of tanks?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle072Subtitle: *All these planes are just air pollution to me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle073Subtitle: *So many troops, General. You weren't actually planning to rush me with them were you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle074Subtitle: *That's quite a base you have going there, General. You did remember to space out your buildings to avoid weapon strikes, right?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle075Subtitle: *Do you know how long it's going to take to clean that up?!?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle076Subtitle: *Get that disgusting radiation out of my base!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle077Subtitle: *Hey, that's my Particle Cannon! You're not authorized to use it!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle078Subtitle: *Is that a tactical move, or are you just hiding?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle079Subtitle: *Colonel Burton? Really? Do you think he's going to help you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle080Subtitle: *Black Lotus? I guess it's just a girl-power showdown, isn't it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle081Subtitle: *Jarmen Kell! He better stay away from my tanks!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle082Subtitle: *Nice Air Field, General--just keep those planes away from my Particle Cannon
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle083Subtitle: *A War Factory? You're seriously going to attack me, aren't you? It's about time
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle084Subtitle: *Good for you - you can build a barracks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle085Subtitle: *Selling your buildings? Is that part of your going out of business sale?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle086Subtitle: *Why don't you just give up? I have better things I could be doing today
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle087Subtitle: *Why can't I ever find one that lasts more than 5 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle088Subtitle: *Looks like you're losing, General. Now what did I say about planning to fail?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle089Subtitle: *That's quite a beating you're taking, General. Are you ready for more?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle090Subtitle: *I'd like to say, \"good fight,\" but clearly your mind wasn't in it, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle091Subtitle: *I can't believe you would beat-up on a girl like this
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle092Subtitle: *I need time to think. Go away, General!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle093Subtitle: *Your tactics are hardly sporting, General. Play nice!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle094Subtitle: *General, look over there! Someone is capturing your buildings! Didn't buy it, huh?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle095Subtitle: *You know, if you were a gentleman, you'd give me five minutes to rebuild my defenses
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle096Subtitle: *What?! It's over? Well, it was nice dancing with you, General. Maybe next time I'll lead
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle097Subtitle: *My Super Weapons are ready... are you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle099Subtitle: *Your rush tactics won't work on me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle100Subtitle: *It's not fair! One more Super Weapon and I would have beaten you, General. Challenge me again, I dare you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle101Subtitle: *I told you you'd never beat my Super Weapons, General. Care to try again?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle102Subtitle: *Welcome, General. Are you ready to begin?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle103Subtitle: *Oh, what's that sound? Now I see a light in the sky... Hmm...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Turtle106Subtitle: *... oh dear... I'm sorry, General, but that's just how I like to say, \"hello.\" Well, good luck, General
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina001Subtitl: *The Americans use the Sentry Drone as an early warning enemy detection system. The drone becomes invisible when it is not moving, and we've seen some of them upgraded with machine guns. Though no match for tanks, the drone can cause problems for foot soldiers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina002Subtitl: *The American Microwave Tank is a big microwave gun that disables structures and vehicles. The radiation from the tank can also hurt infantry, so keep our men at a safe distance
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina003Subtitl: *The Avenger is an American laser based anti-air vehicle able to shoot down missiles and aircraft. It also helps other US units target our planes, so they should be considered high priority targets when encountered within a battle group
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina004Subtitl: *The Specter Gunship is a large jet powered aircraft with multiple weapon systems fixed to its side enabling it to circle a target area and rain death from above. Typical American engineering--using a shotgun to swat a fly
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina005Subtitl: *The Chemical Suit upgrade, makes infantry more resistant to toxins and radiation
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina006Subtitl: *The US Countermeasures upgrade reduces the effectiveness of enemy fire against their air units. Missiles will often miss, and bullets do less damage
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina007Subtitl: *The US Hellfire Drone upgrade creates an remote air drone that defends the parent vehicle with an automated hellfire missile system
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina008Subtitl: *The Bunker Buster is an upgrade to the US Stealth Fighter and the Aurora designed to penetrate garrisoned buildings
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina009Subtitl: *The Supply Lines Upgrade increases the rate that the US gathers resources from supply docks, supply drops, and oil derricks
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina010Subtitl: *The US Generals have seen the wisdom of propaganda. By using a Leaflet Drop they are able to temporarily disable units while they stop to read the propaganda
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina011Subtitl: *The MOAB is an upgrade to the US Fuel Air Bomb that includes a “stun” ability, temporarily shutting down surviving units and structures
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina012Subtitl: *The US Fire Base structure is a defensive position surrounded by sandbags and includes a howitzer and 4 firing positions
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina013Subtitl: *The Napalm Bomb is an upgrade to our Helix airship, allowing it to drop a pair of bombs which create a large firestorm effect
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina014Subtitl: *Our Listening Outpost is a slow, stealthed vehicle with a large sight radius, that can be garrisoned with 2 infantry as guards. Besides uncovering stealthed objects, it can be used to determine enemy destinations by clicking on units in range
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina015Subtitl: *Our Helix 2 airship is a slow transport helicopter that can carry infantry or a single vehicle. Although armed with a light machine gun, it can be upgraded with the Gattling Cannon, Propaganda Tower, or Battle Bunker. It can also be upgraded to carry a large napalm bomb
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina016Subtitl: *The ECM Tank disrupts electronic tracking systems, diverting enemy missile fire. It's electro-magnetic pulse can be used to disable a single enemy vehicle. It also creates a radar jamming field that disables all drones within its range
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina017Subtitl: *The Neutron Shell is an upgrade to our Nuclear Cannon, allowing it to fire neutron shells. These shells kill all infantry, and vehicle pilots inside the blast radius
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina018Subtitl: *The Systems Hack allows your hackers to steal a random Generals power from our enemies. Level 1 allows theft of a 1-star or 3-star power, while level 2 allows theft of a 5-star power
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina019Subtitl: *Our new Carpet Bomber plane drops a series of bombs along a targeted path, decimating all enemy forces
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina020Subtitl: *Our Neutron Mines are an alternative to standard explosive mines. Neutron Mines instantly disable vehicles and kill any nearby infantry
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina021Subtitl: *Our hackers, once vulnerable to attack, will find safety and increased hacking ability in our new Internet Center
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina022Subtitl: *The Satellite Hack I is an internet Center upgrade that allows a reveal around every opponent's Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina023Subtitl: *The Satellite Hack II is an Internet Center upgrade that grants a temporarily reveals the entire map, including stealthed enemy forces
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina024Subtitl: *The GLA Saboteur is a stealth infantry unit that can climb cliffs and effect enemy buildings by entering them. Entering a power plant will temporarily cut power, while entering a superweapon will reset the timer. A saboteur who enters an enemy command center will reset the timers on all enemy General's Powers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina025Subtitl: *The Combat Cycle initially comes with a GLA Rebel driver and a mounted machine gun. The Rebel can be replaced with any other GLA infantry, granting the cycle their unique powers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina026Subtitl: *The GLA Battle Bus can hold up to 8 infantry, who fire out windows. If destroyed, the heavy steel cabin remains like a bunker
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina027Subtitl: *The GLA have upgraded their Workers with Shoes to squeeze even more forced labor from their peasants
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina028Subtitl: *The Camo Netting is an upgrade to GLA base defense structures, making them invisible to normal detection
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina029Subtitl: *The GLA have begun garrisoning Elite Guard troops equipped with RPGs in all their structures. Use caution when infiltrating any GLA bases
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina030Subtitl: *The GLA Booby Trap upgrade enables the rebel to wire structures and civilian vehicles to explode when the enemy attempts to capture or garrison them. Watch for Rebels lurking around buildings in your area
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina031Subtitl: *The GLA tricks have reached a new level. They are now building Fake Structures that look like their real buildings, but are only booby-trapped facades. Destroy everything from range to avoid any GLA surprises
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina032Subtitl: *The GPS Scrambler targets an area of units and makes them invisible to normal detection
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina033Subtitl: *The Sneak Attack power allows GLA Generals to place a defenseless tunnel network anywhere they have explored. Although slightly weaker than a normal tunnel, it is connected to the main network
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina034Subtitl: *The Artillery Platform is a fixed-position cannon capable of single-handedly controlling an area from enemy assault. It should be a priority capture on any battlefield
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina035Subtitl: *A Reinforcement Pad allows a free periodic armor airdrop. Free Battlemasters can turn the tide of any battle
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXChina036Subtitl: *The Repair Bay tech building, when captured, allows battlefield repairs for any ground vehicles. Repairs for damaged armor in a forward position can make the difference between victory and defeat
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA001Subtitle: *Be careful of the American Sentry Drone, General; it can see stealthed units and often has a mounted gun
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA002Subtitle: *The US Microwave Tank has a beam that disables structures and units. It should be attacked by large groups only
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA003Subtitle: *The US Warlock Tank has a beam that disables structures and units. It should be attacked by large groups only
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA004Subtitle: *The US Avenger is a powerful laser-base anti-air vehicle... but we have no planes, so the danger from it is minimal
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA005Subtitle: *The American Specter Gunship is a large plane with big guns. Do not engage it--seek refuge underground until it leaves the area
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA006Subtitle: *With the Chemical Suit upgrade, enemy infantry become more resistant to our toxins. But that won't stop our bullets, will it?
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA007Subtitle: *The Countermeasures upgrade reduces the effect of enemy fire against US air units. Missiles will often miss, and bullets do less damage
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA008Subtitle: *The US Hellfire Drone upgrade is a little toy plane with a missile attached. Another example of American's cowardly tactics
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA009Subtitle: *The Bunker Buster Bomb is an upgrade to the US Stealth Fighter and the Aurora. They use it to try to attack our bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA010Subtitle: *The Supply Lines Upgrade increases the rate that the US gathers resources from supply docks, supply drops, and oil derricks
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA011Subtitle: *The US Leaflet Drop temporarily disables our units as they stop to read the propaganda
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA012Subtitle: *The MOAB is an upgrade to the Fuel Air Bomb that includes a “stun” ability, temporarily shutting down surviving units and structures
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA013Subtitle: *The Fire Base is the American answer to our Stinger sites...but watch out for the big cannon in the middle
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA014Subtitle: *China's Napalm Bomb is a Helix upgrade, allowing it to drop a pair of bombs which create a large firestorm
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA015Subtitle: *The Listening Outpost is a slow, stealthed vehicle the China uses to find our stealthed units. Avoid them to remain hidden
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA016Subtitle: *China's Helix 2 is a slow transport helicopter that can carry infantry or a single vehicle
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA017Subtitle: *The Chinese ECM Tank is a vehicle which disrupts electronic tracking systems, diverting enemy missile fire
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA018Subtitle: *The Neutron Shell is an upgrade to the Chinese Nuke Cannon, allowing it to fire neutron shells. These shells kill all infantry, and vehicle pilots inside the blast radius
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA019Subtitle: *China's new Systems Hack technique allows hackers to steal a random power from their enemies. Such is the downfall of depending on power to fight wars
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA020Subtitle: *The Carpet Bomber is a plane that drops a series of bombs along a targeted path, decimating the enemy
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA021Subtitle: *The Neutron Mines are an alternative to standard Chinese Mines which disable vehicles. The mines still kill infantry as well
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA022Subtitle: *The Internet Center allows China's hackers to increase their effectiveness
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA023Subtitle: *The Satellite Hack I is an internet Center upgrade that allows China to see every opponent's Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA024Subtitle: *The Satellite Hack II is a Chinese Internet Center upgrade that grants a temporary reveal of the entire map, as well as revealing stealthed objects
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA025Subtitle: *The Saboteur is a stealth unit that can climb cliffs and effect enemy buildings by entering them
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA026Subtitle: *Our new Combat Cycle has mounted machine guns and is enhanced by the abilities of any infantry riding it
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA027Subtitle: *The Battle Bus is a slow moving transport that can hold up to 8 infantry, who may fire out of the bus. If destroyed, the hull of the Battle Bus remains and functions like a bunker
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA028Subtitle: *The Worker Shoes upgrade increase speed and gathering efficiency for all our loyal workers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA029Subtitle: *The Camo Netting is an upgrade to our base defense structures, allowing them to be stealthed
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA030Subtitle: *The Elite Guard Upgrade is a structure ability, garrisoning the structure with 4 RPG Troopers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA031Subtitle: *The Booby Trap is an upgrade to the rebel, allowing the unit to wire structures and civilian vehicles to explode when the enemy attempts to capture or garrison them. Captured structures are automatically booby trapped
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA032Subtitle: *Fake Structures can be built for a greatly reduced cost. These buildings are initially a booby-trapped façade, but can be upgraded to fully functional versions of the structure
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA033Subtitle: *Our newly acquired GPS Scrambler targets an area of units and renders them invisible to enemies
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA034Subtitle: *Our Sneak Attack allows placement of a defenseless tunnel network at any area that has been explored. Although slightly weaker than a normal tunnel, it is connected to the main network
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA035Subtitle: *The Artillery Platform fires a weapon similar to the US Strategy Center in terms of range and damage. Capture or avoid its deadly cannon
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA036Subtitle: *The Reinforcement Pad periodically delivers a group of Scorpion tanks for our cause
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXGLA037Subtitle: *The Repair Bay is a front-line repair facility for vehicles. It repairs vehicles like an Arms Dealer
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA001Subtitle: *The Sentry Drone is a mobile unit capable of tracking enemy movements, including those that are camouflaged. The Sentry Drone itself is also capable of stealth when not moving, and may be upgraded with an anti-personnel machine gun from the strategy center
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA002Subtitle: *The Microwave Tank is armed with a Direct-Energy microwave panel that disables targeted structures and vehicles. It also emits a continuous microwave field which damages infantry
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA003Subtitle: *The Warlock tank is armed with a Direct-Energy microwave panel that disables targeted structures and vehicles. It also emits a continuous microwave field which damages infantry
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA004Subtitle: *The Avenger is a laser based anti-air vehicle able to shoot down missiles and aircraft. It can also award bonuses to units attacking it's \"painted\" target
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA005Subtitle: *The Specter Gunship is a large jet powered aircraft with multiple weapon systems fixed to it's wings. While it circles the target, it auto-acquires enemies. Manual targeting is allowed, and it can upgrade to deploy countermeasures
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA006Subtitle: *With the Chemical Suit upgrade, infantry become more resistant to toxins and radiation
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA007Subtitle: *The Countermeasures upgrade reduces the effect of enemy fire against US air units. Missiles will often miss, and bullets do less damage
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA008Subtitle: *The Hellfire Drone upgrade equips the parent vehicle with a drone capable of firing a single missile. The drones auto-acquire and require time to reload
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA009Subtitle: *The Bunker Buster is an upgrade to the Stealth Fighter and the Aurora. In addition to their normal effects, these upgraded missiles damage and even kill units garrisoned within structures, including the GLA Palace, Tunnel Network, and the Chinese Battle Bunker
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA010Subtitle: *The Supply Lines Upgrade increases the amount of money gathered from supply docks, supply drops, and oil derricks
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA011Subtitle: *The Leaflet Drop temporarily disables units as they stop to read the propaganda. The plane dispenses leaflets over the targeted area and the effect only lasts a short time
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA012Subtitle: *The MOAB is an upgrade to the Fuel Air Bomb that includes a “stun” ability, temporarily shutting down surviving units and structures
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA013Subtitle: *The Fire Base is surrounded by sandbags and includes a howitzer and 4 firing positions. Infantry entering the Fire Base will take firing positions behind the sandbags
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA014Subtitle: *The Napalm Bomb is a Helix upgrade, allowing it to drop a pair of bombs which create a large firestorm
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA015Subtitle: *The Listening Outpost is a slow, stealthed vehicle with a large sight radius, and can be garrisoned with 2 infantry as guards. Besides uncovering stealthed objects, it can be used to determine enemy destinations by clicking on units in range
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA016Subtitle: *The Helix 2 is a slow transport helicopter that can carry infantry or a single vehicle. Although armed with a light machine gun, it can be upgraded with the Gattling Cannon, Propaganda Tower, or Battle Bunker. It can also be upgraded to carry a large napalm bomb
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA017Subtitle: *The ECM Tank is a vehicle which disrupts electronic tracking systems, diverting enemy missile fire. It's ECM pulse can be used to disable single enemy vehicles. Finally, it creates a radar jamming field, disabling all drones within its range
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA018Subtitle: *The Neutron Shell is an upgrade to the Chinese Nuke Cannon, allowing it to fire neutron shells. These shells kill all infantry, and vehicle pilots inside the blast radius
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA019Subtitle: *The Systems Hack allows your hackers to steal a random power from your enemies. Level 1 allows theft of a tier 1 or 3 power, while level 2 allows theft of a 5-star power
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA020Subtitle: *The Carpet Bomber is a plane that drops a series of bombs along a targeted path, decimating the enemy
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA021Subtitle: *The Neutron Mines are an alternative to standard Chinese Mines which disable vehicles. The mines still kill infantry as well
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA022Subtitle: *The Internet Center allows hackers to increase their effectiveness at generating money, and allows the use of Satellite Hacks I & II
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA023Subtitle: *The Satellite Hack I is an internet Center upgrade that allows a reveal around every opponent's Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA024Subtitle: *The Satellite Hack II is an internet Center upgrade that grants a temporary reveal of the entire map, as well as revealing stealthed objects
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA025Subtitle: *The Saboteur is a stealth unit that can climb cliffs and effect enemy buildings by entering them. Entering a power plant will temporarily cut power, while entering a superweapon will reset the timer. A saboteur who enters an enemy command center will reset the timers on all enemy General's Powers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA026Subtitle: *The Combat Cycle initially comes with a Rebel driver and a mounted machine gun. Replacing him with a RPG Trooper will allow the bike to fire missiles. A Terrorist will create a suicide bike. Jarmen Kell, Hijackers, and Saboteurs can also ride, making the bike stealthed
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA027Subtitle: *The Battle Van is a slow moving transport that can hold up to 8 infantry, who may fire out of the bus. If destroyed, the hull of the Battle Van remains and functions like a bunker. If it is destroyed, anyone inside is also killed
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA028Subtitle: *The Worker Shoes upgrade increase speed and gathering efficiency for all GLA workers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA029Subtitle: *The Camo Netting is an upgrade to GLA base defense structures, allowing them to be stealthed
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA030Subtitle: *The Elite Guard Upgrade is an structure ability, garrisoning the structure with 4 RPG Troopers
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA031Subtitle: *The Booby Trap is an upgrade to the rebel, allowing the unit to wire structures and civilian vehicles to explode when the enemy attempts to capture or garrison them. The explosion damages everything within a small radius. Structures captured by an upgraded rebel are automatically booby trapped
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA032Subtitle: *Fake Structures can be built for a greatly reduced cost. These buildings are initially a booby-trapped façade, but can be upgraded to fully functional versions of the structure
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA033Subtitle: *The GPS Scrambler targets an area of units and renders them stealthed to enemies
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA034Subtitle: *The Sneak Attack allows placement of a defenseless tunnel network at any area that has been explored. Although slightly weaker than a normal tunnel, it is connected to the main network
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA035Subtitle: *The artillery platform is armed with a large caliber howitzer. It is an excellent suppression weapon. It is also a good gathering point from which to launch an assault
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA036Subtitle: *The Reinforcement Pad Periodically reinforces the player with one of his side's main battle tank (Scorpion, Battlemaster, Crusader)
DIALOGEVENT:UnitDescriptXUSA037Subtitle: *The Repair Bay is a repair facility for vehicles. Vehicles must “dock” with the structure in the same way that they must dock with the war factory

HELP:Hijacker-01: RADA:\nWprowadź porywacza do nieprzyjacielskiego pojazdu, by go ukraść.
MAP:MD-USA04_Hint08: RADA:\nBuduj bazy ogniowe, by wspomóc obronę bazy.
MAP:MD-USA04_Hint10: RADA:\nBuduj systemy obronne na polu naftowym, by ochronić szyby.
MAP:MD-USA06Warning17: OSTRZEŻENIE:\nDr Thrax słynie z wykorzystywania ataku z zaskoczenia\ndo budowy sieci tuneli i niespodziewanego atakowania wroga.
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_1: \nAtak na chińśką bazę właśnie się rozpoczyna\nBaza Chińczyków wkrótce będzie nasza
MAP:MD_CHI03-Info-MissionObjective-01: CEL MISJI:\nZniszczyć posągi AŚW, by wyzwolić miasto. Poziom opinii międzynarodowej\nna nasz temat będzie spadać, dopóki nie wykonamy zadania.
MAP:MD_CHI03-Info-MissionObjective-02: ODEBRANA WIADOMOŚĆ:\nJeśli poziom opinii międzynarodowej\nna nasz temat spadnie do zera, poniesiemy klęskę.
MAP:MD_CHI03-Info-MissionObjective-03: ODEBRANA WIADOMOŚĆ:\nNiszcz posągi AŚW, by podnieść poziom opinii międzynarodowej.
MAP:MD_CHI03-Info-MissionObjective-10: ODEBRANA WIADOMOŚĆ:\nWyzwoliliśmy miasto!\nTeraz zniszcz bazę AŚW na północ od rzeki.
MAP:MD_CHI03-Event-Built-SpeakerTower-01: ODEBRANA WIADOMOŚĆ:\nTen megafon podnosi poziom opinii międzynarodowej na nasz temat.
